title: Yandex Music, Books & Podcasts
description:
What is Yandex Music?
‚óè Your favorite music, along with audiobooks and podcasts on various topics
‚óè If you download music, you can listen to it even offline
‚óè My Vibe is a smart recommendation system that instantly adapts to your preferences
‚óè A convenient player
‚óè Editor's selections of music, audiobooks, and podcasts
‚óè High-quality music available for download to listen offline
‚óè App for smartwatches with Wear OS

Yandex Music
Licensed music library: popular and original songs, podcasts, and audiobooks free during the trial period
An easy-to-use music player lets you listen to and download music in high-quality lossless audio for free with a Plus subscription
Music enthusiasts love various genres, so we have playlists covering rock, pop, 90s disco, and much more. Press play and start enjoying your favorite tracks.  
The player recognizes music; all you have to do is let it listen when a song is playing. 
Whether you're searching by year, genre, activity, mood, holiday, or weekday, we have a playlist for you. The library includes Russian and international music, dance music, movie soundtracks, electronic music, children's music, internet hits, and new releases.
In addition to free music for offline listening, the trial period includes hundreds of thousands of audiobooks:
‚óè Detective stories, thrillers, science fiction, and current non-fiction
‚óè Bestsellers in the Editors' Choice section under Podcasts and Books
‚óè Audiobooks for children of all ages, including poems and fairy tales
‚óè The option to download audiobooks for offline listening
‚óè Free listening for new users
Yandex Music features exclusive podcasts
Listen to new episodes at normal pace or speed them up. If you need to pause, the app will remember your place so you can resume later. Popular categories include humor, science, culture, lectures, fairy tales, and more.
Music player
If you love music, you understand the importance of audio quality. That's why Yandex Music added the HQ function to our music player.
Try it out. The first note will sound clearer than ever. When you download tracks, you'll enjoy the same great quality offline.
Plus
Yandex Plus offers the perfect opportunity to listen to music, audiobooks, and podcasts online or offline. It also includes:
An opportunity to download music to your phone
A convenient in-app music player
Access to Kinopoisk, where you can watch ad-free movies and series
Bonus points for using Yandex services
With a Plus subscription, enjoy music, podcasts, and audiobooks offline and ad-free.
The music catalog may not be available in some countries. Learn more: yandex.ru/legal/yandex_plus_privilege_list/
Join our community
Discuss all things music on our VK Music page: https://vk.com/yandexmusic
Watch live broadcasts and streams on our YouTube music page: https://www.youtube.com/c/MusicYandex
Yandex Music provides a wide range of listening experiences: from songs and soundtracks to thrilling audiobooks and podcasts. Enjoy a free trial with limitless listening possibilities. The app recognizes music, displays lyrics, and allows offline and ad-free listening.

‚óè If you download music, you can listen to it even offline

summary: Songs, playlists, podcasts, audiobooks, offline
developer: Direct Cursus Computer Systems Trading LLC

scraped_reviews.content: This app is really nice and has a lot of great features, like of course the suggestion algorithm and downloadable tracks that don't take up that much space, but my main and basically only gripe with this app is that I just wish it had more music? Some very popular songs ARE present, but for some reason not the original studio versions, but rather the concert recordings. Also a lot of videogame soundtracks are not in this app, even though something like spotify has them. Hope more gets added
They have updated the app and added the "Smooth Transition" feature. I hate this feature, but I cannot turn it off, the button doesn't work in the settings. Please fix it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Tell us more about the situation in the support chat, please: clck.ru/Rx7AH We will try to help!

scraped_reviews.content: An absulte gem of an app, beats everything on the market, especially Spotify. Great UI/UX, but most importantly the groundbreaking Suggestion Algorithm! I have discovered so much music that is 100% my sound! A treat that i enjoy daily. It also synchronizes with ALL your devices. It then lets you upload your own tracks and, thus, you don't need a music player at all. You can also download tracks or playlists to not use bandwidth if limited. Made with love by music fans with high IT skill! üíï

The best music app, but once my Yandex Plus ended, I can't use it because it's "not available in your region," and there is only one button: "choose another account," which will not help. 15GB of music is currently lost.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please write about this issue in the support chat: clck.ru/Rx7AH We will try to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Near perfection, congratulations to Yandex Music team for such an achievement.

It's pretty good, but you can't tune it for yourself, it doesn't have settings at all. Lots of tracks are missed, recommendations work badly, and it does not save any statistics, everything what you can get is tracks played, not even hours played! And why I can't turn off podcasts? I don't need them and never did. they only get in the way when i use the app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! Please tell us what tracks you are missing on our service: we will try to add it üòâ We will try to take it into account in further work on the application.

scraped_reviews.content: The "Play/Pause" icon in the notification drawer is always in the "Pause" state. When I pause music and close the app, the notification is still displayed but when I try to play music from there - notification simply disappears with no effect. Then, if I open the app, last playlist and track are not saved. Update: Most of the time I have Battery Saver turned on so it is worth to check it. P.S. Didn't find how to report a bug with logs inside the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can write to us via the feedback form: My music - Settings - Contact support.

scraped_reviews.content: Cheap subscription, available in my country. But after using YouTube Music and Spotify, After 2 weeks of usage I'm still struggling. UI is very confusing. For example I have to make a lot of clicks to get into my Favourite playlist. I wish I was able to open the app and just click ONE button to play my Favourite playlist (like in YT Music). And I don't like that audio books, podcasts and music are mixed everywhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We will try to take it into account in further work on the application.

scraped_reviews.content: Nice player, but music library is pure. I can't find some of my favorite groups. Everything else, including the price, is fine. I really enjoy the player - fast, smart and simple. But there is one thing, which makes me sad: shuffling tracks. I am not sure, what is the reason, but tracks order repeats often. Maybe, I should add more tracks to my playlist for getting it work better.

By the functionality it's a pretty good app (tho you still can't access your accidentally blocked songs). By content it's terrible, a good portion of music isn't available anymore. It's understandable but they are also blocking the playback ability when you are travelling even if you paid for Plus. You also can't access your downloaded songs too. So when you are travelling this app enters in the unusable state.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So that we can figure everything out faster and help you, please contact us in the chat at clck.ru/Rx7AH. We are waiting.

scraped_reviews.content: I like your music interface, but I have met with 2 problems: Firstly, that was hard for me to add my friends' playlists, please, would you make it easier? The second problem is podcast interface. I lack of it's publication date. P.S. I can find playlists of other users, searching for it's name, but how can I make friends on Yandex Music, so I could see their interests, playlists, favourite tracks maybe? Also wanted to say, that your recommendation system is incredible, thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Tell us what the difficulties are in adding playlists to friends? We will definitely think about sorting podcasts.

scraped_reviews.content: Freezes or takes too long to load after starting the app. Annoying. Navigation is confusing and too complex.

Awful. I'm not going to like every song which I like. i have the favorite bands and want listen them on specific days. But here you choose the band page and get only 20 songs to listen. There isn't option to unfold the list further(to less popular song. Only choose a song behind first 20s). Also, the app decides for you what version of song to listen. I don't want to see radio edit one. Give me the orginal. But there even isn't option to choose. The support's mission to keep you silent.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you wrote to us by mail, please send us the number of your appeal (it will be in the subject of the letter), we will find your message and we will help. You can also write to the Yandex Music community in private messages on any social network and briefly describe the situation. We'll be waiting.

scraped_reviews.content: UX become worse and worse every time. Strong promotion of podcasts. You can't easily reach playlist of the day, even if you only use this app to listen music. Right now developers add another useles block with video clips. For what? And I need to scrol down, then scroll right to listen music. Podcasts became very annoying, app started puting them at the end of the playlists. How that can be recomended to me if I never listen podcasts?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We will try to take it into account in further work on the application.

scraped_reviews.content: 1. Poor music base. Sometime it's pretty hard to find some tracks that you shazamed recently. 2. Station feature is horrible! I like what it recommends me, BUT if I want to save some track and it has finished playing, it is impossible to go back! That's insulting me so bad.. 3. Recently played list is showing me albums, but it is better to show all the recently played tracks! Even those wich were recently played through the station feature.

In common I like the app. But: I can't see my history of radio.. And I can't go to previous track. It is often case - I listen good music by radio, a track is switching to next one and I can't do anithing to find the prev. liked track. Nothing can be worse with radio.. Next case - I can Dislike a track by mistake! No any alert or validation, just misclicking - and that's it your favorite track in garbage... I'm using subscription and expecting best experience - but.. It is very sad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please try to expand the large player in the Radio tab and click the button in the upper right corner. Will there be a broadcast history? We have written down your wishes about the possibility to return to the previous track and about the warning when disliking. So far, you can write to us about deleted tracks, we will help you to find them üòâ

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app! I really appreciate the music suggestions in the playlist of the day and in Stations, that's how I found A LOT of great bands. But still needs improvement in terms of performance. The player in the notification bar won't resume playing when you pause and leave it for 2-5 minutes. You need to open the, app wait until it loads and then tap play again. It takes time and kinda is annoying. Sometimes it just crashes for no apparent reason. Hope you'll fix the issues.
Voice search for songs doesn't work.

Great app, great music. Stands to my needs and expectations. Loving it so far. EDIT AFTER A FEW MONTHS: i believe that this is the best music app ever.. it knows the music i like. has all the new songs and is updated daily. i find at least 2 to 3 songs that i love everyday. i dont think i can work, study, drive, workout or even live without it anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for supporting our app! It really means a lot to us üí´

scraped_reviews.content: Great music platform, one minus is I could not find some songs I would like to listen. But anyway it worths its priceüëçüëç

4 years since this review and it's still unusable. App stops in the middle of the song most of the time. You have to go back, search for the same song and play it again. I started same song 3 times. It happened during all three attempts. I would understand if it was only one time thing, or during one song. But it happens all the time. If this happens during trial period, simply listening to music turns into frustrating, annoying experience, you can't expect people to subscribe to your service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please, contact us using the contact form on the app: press the gear-wheel sign in the upper line of the interface ‚Üí ¬´Contact developers¬ª ‚Üí choose the subject of the request. Thus, we will learn all the necessary technical details and will be able to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Guys pardon me but a dislikes playlist is NOT what this app lacks. I can't find many albums and singles, they're just not there (Wet Leg, a whole bunch of King Gizzard albums, new Arctic Monkeys and Gorillaz singles, list goes on). Basically I have to go to another app to listen to the music that this one just doesn't have. To top it off, my subscription got upgraded without my consent (meaning it got 50% more expensive), the result: unsubscribed, not recommended.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please, contact us using the contact form on the app: press the gear-wheel sign in the upper line of the interface ‚Üí ¬´Contact developers¬ª ‚Üí choose the subject of the request. Thus, we will learn all the necessary technical details and will be able to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Recently, my music started to turn off when my Samsung goes into sleep mode. Everything is fine when I switch off the screen, however, after about 30 seconds music just stops. As soon as I turn my phone back on the music automatically continues. I should also admit that before I experienced a short pause occasionally when playing music on locked phone but now it is much worse. Ok, I couldn't allow background activity in settings, but I have turned on always on display and solved the problem

Its all about trends not your preferences. It doesn't give a s""t about what you prefer not to see at home page even with paid subscription. Customization doesn't exist in this service. Upd. Yes, it adapts. But if I dont want any podcasts on my list? If I want to hide all things I don't need I cannot do this. Instead of ads the service keeps recommending or showing me things I don't need. I cannot block every track in every genre I don't listen to and you know this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: All your actions, such as likes, dislikes, adding tracks to playlists or, conversely, skipping tracks, form music recommendations. Artificial intelligence adapts to you and creates your perfect playlist for every day.

scraped_reviews.content: Not a patch on the iOS version of the app. Try to search for a particular artist (russian group by the name of Cream Soda) and nothing comes up except podcasts!! I didn't want podcasts. Maybe it's a limitation of the app as it's russian and I am in England, but, as I said, I had no problems with the iOS version. So sorry, but I cancelled the sub. Going back to Zvooq.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: In some countries there are only podcasts and small number of tracks available in the app. We are working on expanding the geography of our service!

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely love Yandex Music! üé∂ The app has a huge music library, high-quality sound, and smooth performance. I like the personalized recommendations and playlists ‚Äî they always match my mood. The interface is clean, user-friendly, and fast. Definitely one of the best music apps out there!"

New icon and new design is lacking at most. App became clunky and absolutely not user-friendly. Now to access playlists you should tap on your collection twice, because someone decided that you want to see not only your favorites, but six last tracks. And it isn't adjustable. Artist icon is huge and still useless because it wasn't meant to be displayed in such tiny manner, it isn't visible enough and shouldn't be there in the first place. Overall I'm very unsatisfied
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. We will try to take it into account in further work on the application.

scraped_reviews.content: it says the app is unavailable in my region... then why can I download it? update: there's never an interface I can click for help since it doesn't let me into the app after I log in
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please, contact us from the app: the gear-wheel sign in the upper line of the interface ‚Üí ¬´Contact developers¬ª. We will try to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Play next would be a wonderful UX improvement. Playlists aren't too great, although the library seems to be pretty extensive. Radio feature is good, listen to blues and jazz radio all the time, while rock one is really messed up (to my mind). Moreover, the interesting feature of choosing the mood in the radio mode is nice, but misses frequently : i.e. for "sad" often plays upbeat and joyful tracks among the slow and melancholic ones. It would be great also to be able to select multiple features.

it's hard to find required functions. E. g. listened a podcast, then switched off and on the app and could not find how to start my podcast during 3-5 min. There is no history (or could not find), on main screen there is some weird podcasts advertisement that can't be deleted "story of russian sex". It's being shown each time I open the app, VERy annoing. It's some usual user experience for Yandex apps and Services, same is on Yandex.Efir (video service).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We will try to take it into account in further work on the application.

scraped_reviews.content: The app drained 30% of the battery for 1 hour 40 minutes. It is crazy, please fix
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please write to us in the chat using the ¬´Write to support¬ª button in the ¬´Profile¬ª section in the app. Tell us more about what's going wrong, and we'll try to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to have heart button "add song to favorites" on the always on display widget, well not any more for some reason, really sad about it, was easy to add a song to favorites without opening the phone, since the Vibe feature is so great and with some tweaking manages to guess our music preferences without having to set it. Would put 5 stars if the üñ§would appear back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So that we can quickly sort out this issue, please contact us in the chat clck.ru/Rx7AH. We will be waiting.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been subscribed, provided payment method and got receipt. but looks like the app doesn't get it.. I hate these half baked apps, that maybe really just half baked, and maybe do it on purpose. I also don't see how to cancel subscription. Probably also on purpose.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please write to us through the feedback form in the application: "Settings" ‚Üí "Contact support".

scraped_reviews.content: Subscribed to Plus service, but wasn't able to activate service. 2-3 hours wasted time on chat with Help Desk that couldn't provide solution or refund, so they simply directed to Support team who isn't reachable at all (no online tool, you can only send email and after 24 hours they might reply if you are lucky) If honestly I was going to use Kinopoisk during my long flight, but looks I need to find alternative option.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you wrote to plus@support.yandex.ru, please send us the number of the appeal (it will be in the subject of the letter), we will find your message and we will help. You can also write to the Yandex Plus community in private messages on any social network and briefly describe the situation. We'll be waiting.

scraped_reviews.content: Rarely I notice uploads of low quality (ex.: CD rips that cut song endings, etc.) and not full discographies of artists (not all albums listed). Also they focus on uploading remastered versions of albums, sometimes I would prefer to hear original versions. App design could be more high end. Anyhow, I enjoy personalised music compilations generated by the app and it is overall stable and user-friendly, works well for daily listening. Cheers.

a way tooo many irritating elements appeared in the app. "Meet our new icon!", animations, animations, animations - looks epileptic. panels in the middle of playlists. At the same time player widget is now glitching and appears only 2 times out of 10. The tracks that cannot be played due to license are nowhere to be found and nit shown even in grey, no way to even recall their names anyhow. Was a good app in mid summer, now starts to bcome an overmarketed junk. I regretted a lot I'd updated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please, contact us using the contact form on the app: press the gear-wheel sign in the upper line of the interface ‚Üí ¬´Contact developers¬ª ‚Üí choose the subject of the request. Thus, we will learn all the necessary technical details and will be able to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: How can I search among my tracks in the playlist? That is impossible. I find new favorites in "Playlist of the day" And "Liked on the Radio", and I never remember their titles or author. When a supergood song plays in My collection, I quickly look up the screen for its title to remember, but almost never remember more than 1 word. Problem begins when I try to find that song after. I remember 1 word, so I could search and find it, but search works globally, not in playlist. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Search is indeed not available in all playlists yet, however, there is search in the ¬´Tracks¬ª section of the ¬´Collection¬ª tab. This section contains all the tracks from your music library. Try to search for the songs you want there :)

scraped_reviews.content: If you want some free music, this app is not for you. It's even worse than on a desktop (via web-browser), where you can listen to some music (some time ago they changed their policy and now you can listen to music in your browser when it's not in a background mode, yes, you can't even minimise your browser's window). Stopped using their services, for they're begging for money all the time. Btw, their ad service Direct Yandex promotes scam ads, people complained many times, but in vain
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Free music listening is not currently available. To access our music collection, you can pay for the subscription on the website https://plus.yandex.ru/ or in the application!

scraped_reviews.content: I definitely adore this app. Even though I think it Can be better. The app doesn't have many features I wish it could have someday. *Being able to sort the tracks alphabetically inside the playlists. * Like button position. And the whole player's UI *Being able to choose which languages we like to listen or in wich country because it is annoying for international users seeing alot of russian music. Pls let it be separated between russian and international markets. Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the feedback ‚ù§Ô∏è We will try to take it into account in further work on the application üßê

scraped_reviews.content: Probably best system for suggesting new music, but Yandex Music has so many techical issues that i barely can stand. PC issues: bad support for PC version. Phone issues (i have samsung A52 by the comment's typing time): terrible and random bags & lags + the most serious problem is that ALL songs freeze in the middle of playing for no particular reason (also random) it may be triggered by suddenly oppening or closing some other apps, but mostly happens for no reason. 2 stars, maybe even less 1.5
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please, contact us using the contact form on the app: press the gear-wheel sign in the upper line of the interface ‚Üí ¬´Contact developers¬ª ‚Üí choose the subject of the request. Thus, we will learn all the necessary technical details and will be able to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: 1. Yandex Music DOESN'T HAVE the latest songs but good enough number of English songs for me. 2. There are a lot of remixes here. Once you liked a song you are suggested to listen to that song in every shape, taste, smell, dimension etc. 3. Since Yandex is based in Russia, there is a good number of Russian songs. Note:The reason I have even tried Yandex Music is all other options I tried (Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon Music and few more) didn't accept my debit card for some unknown reason.

It is the official mobile interface to Yandex Music database of streaming music, there's no point in comparing the app with others as there are no alternatives. If you pay for Yandex Music and have made a significant investment into your personalization settings (likes and playlists), then you have to use this app. At the same time it is not bad at all. You have all the basic stuff and the recommendation engine powered by Yandex Music servers works fine. The huge downside is the lack of Android Auto support. It is hard to understand why this was not implemented after such a long time. Car integration should be an essential part of any music player at this point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We don't have enough characters here to answer. Please contact us via the feedback form: the gear icon in the "Collection" section (heart) ‚Üí "Contact developers" ‚Üí select the subject of the message. We'll be waiting!

scraped_reviews.content: Yandex Music is probably the best music streaming app that I have used. It exceeds all of my expectations of a music app and has more music available to me than Spotify or YouTube Music. My only complaint is that it is extremely difficult for users in the United States and Canada to be able to access Yandex Music. I hope that this app becomes more easily accessible in more countries.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Michael, thanks for the feedback! We will try to take it into account in further work on the application.

scraped_reviews.content: It's great overall, but it's really lacking the "search" option within your favourites or a particular playlist! Also it'd be helpful if a band info would be displayed when you're viewing it. Apart from that, it's great: stylish, customizable, with a good library etc.

Lots of issues with continuous playing. In my car it works well, but when used on radio mode it never plays more 2 songs in a row... App is still buggy, i switched from spotify premium to Yandex and the spotify interface is much more mature and robust. Feels like there are some more improvements to make but the algorithm is good and i find it matches my taste. Sum it all I'm still using it but i do expect some improvements to be done in order to stand in the level of the competitors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ishay, please email us from the app Settings immediately after reproducing bug on radio. So we'll receive the logs and fix it.

scraped_reviews.content: the music choice is awfully dull. some artists don't exist within this app. even more painfully, some albums are absent even from those artists, who are on the app. "my vibe" works straight up goofy. for an example, when listening to "my vibe" from a frank sinatra song, only half the time did i actually get something relevant, and the other half, i got anime openings and even "erika!" (a german marching song). music quality is quite great though, but this is the only pro i see.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We don't have enough characters here to answer. Please contact us via the feedback form: the gear icon in the "Collection" section (heart) ‚Üí "Contact developers" ‚Üí select the subject of the message. This will help us get the information we need. We will be waiting.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: I wanted to come back to use this app. Nothing works. Can't sign in using Google h getting errors. I tried Facebook but the subscribe button doesn't work. What's going on Yandex? 1 start until you fix it. Old review: Great app. Like Spotify, but cheaper. Works great and can even detect songs like shazam. Great and cheap... BUT! Google home does not support it and this might make me move to Spotify.. it's annoying when Google home uses Spotify with ads (because I am paying for Yandex).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can contact us via email music@support.yandex.ru or using this form ‚Äî clck.ru/Rx7AH. Thus, we will learn all the necessary technical details and will be able to help you!

scraped_reviews.content: Music choice is not great but it is understandable. The thing that really bothers is that my saved music disappears entirely once in a while. I saved 8+ hous of music to listen without using mobile data and now I have to download everything again. Also music stream interrupts for no reason until I unblock my phone and check the app. It is annoying but I have no other choice but to use this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please, contact us using the contact form on the app: press the gear-wheel sign in the upper line of the interface ‚Üí ¬´Contact developers¬ª ‚Üí choose the subject of the request. Thus, we will learn all the necessary technical details and will be able to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's been 3 days how I can't login to my account. I've already changed my password. Sometimes I get the error - no internet, but it's ok with my connection both WiFi and mobile internet. But most often I put log in and nothing happens. Upd. Just deleted and installed the app. Tryed to login once again and even passed some steps successfully but when I received confirmation code by SMS and put it, the app froze.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It‚Äôs a rather difficult issue that requires more information. Contact us using the form on the site music.yandex.com. At the bottom of the webpage there is a bottom ¬´Help¬ª, press it, and choose ¬´Contact support¬ª in the left menu. Then choose the subject and describe the situation üôå

scraped_reviews.content: App is great. It's a problem that there is no function to "play this song next" and there are a lot of same versions of one song that's why it brings the problem with adding one song many times. I mentioned that yandex music has little library because I can't find songs like Marilyn Manson- stigmata, moldanazar which is pretty popular in Kazakhstan, placebo - passive aggressive and etc. That really hurts, guys(

title: PayPal - Pay, Send, Save
description:
PayPal is a smart and secure way to shop in-store and online, earn cash back on brands you love, send money to friends and much more. Get started in the app.

SAVE OFFERS IN THE APP
Get cash back offers* from brands you love. We‚Äôll automatically apply them at checkout.
*Eligible items only. Redeem points for cash or other options. Terms and exclusions apply: PayPal.com/rewards-terms
¬†
SEND AND REQUEST MONEY FOR FREE
Securely send and receive money with just about anyone in 120+ countries
It‚Äôs free to send and receive with friends & family in the US when funded by a bank account or PayPal balance.

GET THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD AND EARN CASH BACK
Request your card right in the app. No credit check required.
Shop with your PayPal balance everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted.
Earn 5% cash back on a category you choose each month*

*5% cash back earned as points you redeem for cash & other options on up to $1000 spend/month. Terms apply: http://paypal.com/rewardspal.
A PayPal balance account is required to get the card.
The PayPal Debit Mastercard¬Æ‚ÄØis issued by The Bancorp Bank N.A. (‚ÄúBancorp‚Äù), pursuant to a license by Mastercard‚ÄØInternational Incorporated and may be used everywhere Mastercard is accepted. Mastercard and the circles design are registered trademarks of‚ÄØMastercard International Incorporated. Bancorp is issuer of the Card only and not responsible for the associated accounts or other products, services, or offers from PayPal. PayPal is a financial technology company, not a bank. The Card is linked to your PayPal Balance account. See PayPal Balance Terms and Conditions: https://www.paypal.com/us/legalhub/pp-balance-tnc#holding

CRYPTOCURRENCY
Buy, sell and hold Bitcoin, Ethereum, PayPal USD, Bitcoin Cash and Litecoin with PayPal*

*PayPal, Inc. is licensed to engage in virtual currency business activity by the NY Dept. of Financial Services. To buy, sell, transfer, and hold crypto is subject to risks, may result in significant losses, and not available where prohibited by law. We do not make recommendations about crypto transactions. Consider seeking advice from a financial and tax advisor. Crypto custody, trades and transfer services are performed for us by Paxos Trust Co. LLC or other appropriately authorized provider. See terms: paypal.com/crypto_terms

GROW YOUR MONEY WITH HIGH-YIELD PAYPAL SAVINGS
Roll your money into PayPal Savings and earn a competitive APY*
Easily manage your account right from the app. Transfer money in and out, set individual goals, and track your progress as your savings grows.

*PayPal Savings annual percentage yield (APY) is a variable rate and can change at any time, including after the account is opened. PayPal is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking service provided by Synchrony Bank, Member FDIC. PayPal Balance account is required to use PayPal Savings.

TRACK YOUR PACKAGES
View your¬†orders¬†and their delivery status right from the PayPal app‚Äìeven if you didn‚Äôt pay with PayPal. Simply link your Gmail or Outlook to get started.
Get live updates each step of the way until they arrive safely at your door.
Not all sellers are participants.
¬†
PAY IN 4 WITH NO LATE FEES
Split everyday purchases into 4 interest-free payments at millions of online stores.
No late fees. No impact to your credit score.
Manage payments right in the app.

*Pay in 4 is available upon approval for purchases of $30 - $1500 and is currently not available to residents of MO or NV. 18 years old or older to apply. PayPal, Inc.: Loans to CA residents are made or arranged pursuant to a CA Financing Law License. GA Installment Lender Licensee, NMLS #910457. RI Small Loan Lender Licensee. NM residents: Go to paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/campaigns/newmexicodisclosure. Learn more at paypal.com/payin4

Availability of features varies by market.

PayPal
2211 N 1st St San Jose, CA 95131

summary: The PayPal app is the secure way to send and receive money, shop and pay in 4.

scraped_reviews.content: Okay, why is it that sometimes cash back rewards instantly calculate but other times it'll stay pending? I had one pending for three months, some for several days, while most of them clear within minutes. This is my only complaint. But, I do have a bunch of friends that stopped using PayPal. One because someone hacked and stole their money and PayPal didn't investigate it for them, an other because some reason money started disappearing off their linked bank card while they weren't using it....

I've been with PayPal quite a while. as an online bank they are ok. HOWEVER . they do not seem to honor the rewards program that they offer. they are supposed to pay 5% back to you on certain purchases. I chose groceries. and I have spent over $400 in the past two months and they have not added the rewards compensation. I have sent 9 e mails without response. so I called today and I have to wait 2 days on call back while they investigate! it should not be this hard to collect what they offer!

app doesn't work anymore. if you try to go to credit, it reloads for about 5 minutes and then says unavailable. this has been going on for weeks. According to PayPal, somehow their app is a bank issue and nothing to do with them. synchrony bank rightfully blames PayPal. seems like both sides know it's a problem but no one has a solution so until it's fixed I don't recommend using PayPal at all. you can't view or pay for your transactions right now.

PayPal as a whole is good, all the new interfaces are absolutely horrible. Everything you need is hidden under extra menus. Everything you need to do is more clicks, more steps, more time. I just needed to reference an invoice number, its not in the list of transactions, its not even the transaction detail, you have to click a 3rd thing and open the invoice just to see what the invoice number was. Making an invoice on the web interface is painfull now. I'm dredding the day they force the new way

I'm not sure what has happened, but my entire account is messed up. Transactions that never happened, no receipt for transactions that did happen. Crazy excuses to refuse moving money or accepting payments. Log in issues every single day! Asked to verify personal info over and over and over. constantly having to login to make any kind of money movement. Sickening.

I've used PayPal for years, but since the recent update, it makes transferring money OUT of PayPal a nightmare. The Transfer button is buried in your Accounts menu instead of being in the main menu. It's easy to add money to PayPal or pay someone else's PayPal, but when it comes to moving money to YOUR OWN BANK, it's like pulling teeth finding the button. Put the transfer button in the main menu! Also, removing an old account is nearly impossible. You can add Accounts, but can't manage them.

They did something to mess it up. I suspect they're trying to push PayPal users into new credit cards or debit systems to generate more revenue for PayPal, but actions that used to be simple and straightforward are now unnecessarily complicated. For example transferring my PayPal balance to my bank account used to be very straightforward, but now the setting is buried. I clicked on the wrong thing multiple times before I finally scrolled way down and found what I was looking for.

I gave the app 2 stars because it's literally impossible to pay your Paypal Credit bills on the app. Every time I try linking my bank account, it says it was successful and that I can close the window but it doesn't save my linked bank to my Paypal account. I've probably tried this over 10 times already and it's frustrating. I have to keep calling to make payments now. Don't add a screen that exits out of Paypal Credit and removes all of the progress made to link your bank account.

In order to use the app, you have to dismiss a credit card offer, debit card offer, cryptocurrency trading account, coupon and offers screen, and receive unsolicited scam invoices that you cannot block. It's no mystery why all your friends tell you to Venmo, Cash App, or risk it with Zelle before mentioning PayPal. Unfortunately, it's probably a matter of time before the cancer spreads to Venmo.

Works great! When you send the money to friends and family and I need it right away the thing is wonderful. It's great when purchasing things online. On your PayPal app you set a default way for it to be taken out to pay for what you're ordering whether it's on Walmart or any place else. Just remember that if you're using PayPal to pay and it's not something that you want to come off of whatever your default card is you need to go in and change it.

was fine for the over 10 years I've been using them, but this past year has been absolutely nothing but problems. Constantly telling me to update my address, not being able to update because the app and website crash, finally updating but oh wait, they didn't recognize that address! finally got that fixed and now I can't use my card AGAIN for seemingly no reason that I can discern. Absolutely horrendous experience, you're better off just making a Chime account, at least it works.

While I appreciate the concept of ease of use of moving funds, PayPal is not it. PayPal Credit falsely advertised that it can be used to send funds to friends, despite the fact that the credit in fact can't be used for that. Additionally, the bank transfer timelines to add to your PayPal balance are inaccurate. I added funds, was told it would take 3-4 days, and got a completely different date from the ChatBot. Unless you are using ACH or Debit to add to your balance, don't bother.

Used the App for the Pay-in-4 option. PayPal ignored that and said we are gonna charge you the full amount. Called and they said the seller did not accept Pay-in-4. Not true, the seller gets paid either way, they don't care. Seller confirmed PayPal handles it. PayPal shifts the blame and does not make it easy to leave THEM a complaint (page is lost somewhere) but many options for complaint on the seller though. The app can't perform basic functions right, and you're stuck with the bill for it.

I had no problems I tried to make a payment from a third party site Luckily the money didn't transfer. PP updated with a fresh new look on site. Even it's still secure tho. Yes there are some few changes to personal PP. Can receive credit, money, shopping, paying bills under ¬£100 pounds is completely free. PP charges extra fees on top over ¬£100 mark. We Can/ can't complain on everything . Like any company, read the small print.

This app does not seem to be able to access PayPal Credit directly. For several weeks now, I've been met with a "the service is unavailable try again later" screen. Ultimately, I have to circumvent this by simply visiting the site on my phone's browser. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app (twice) to no success. As it is now, you're better off just going to the site.

Works fine for transferring money between friends. Sometimes works for making purchases from websites to help secure your card info. Sometimes, though, it will choose a random card or account to charge and there's nothing you can do about it. They don't care about any fees or overdraft charges you might face because they chose a rarely used account you don't keep much money in. Then they send an email blaming you. Good luck finding a way to contact a person. The settings menus are labrynthine.

It takes hours to log into your account because of their stupid security check. 20 different "pick the pictures with the bikes, the motorcycles, the buses, the crosswalks" over and over and over again. Finally get to log in, try to transfer any money and they make you do it AGAIN. Over and over and over again! And now, I can't add money to my account. Customer support said it was an issue with cash app. they lied cause I tried a different card, same thing. Worthless app!!!

It's nearly impossible to verify the e-mail of people that you've had transactions with before - I had to search for the e-mail; I couldn't just view it on someone's profile. 2025-10-01: My review stands. You can't verify e-mails when selecting an account to send money to, and the premature 'send' button makes you think you're sending the money and that's it, when you still do get to choose G&S or F&F and a shipping address on the next screen.

I have everything set up correctly, then PayPal changes something behind scenes and I don't find out until payments are coming out the wrong account. Some option hidden behind three menus overrides the payment method I choose at checkout. Despite diligence this has caused problems on multiple occasions. This is a serious issue for a financial service!

They hijack your money. They put a hold on your money even though you cancel a order and the company refunds you. You have to wait 5 days for them to return it and they don't care, their customers service sucks. and they ignore and dismiss you with a generic answer. It's only good for small amount purchases. Not for large amount of money purchases. Beware they will leave you without money.

I've had paypal since it began and yes, some things that they have updated are great,but the problem is I can't transfer money from a card that i've been transferring money from for years.All of a sudden, every time I try to move money, there's a problem with the transaction.I can go put money on in a store that cost me more money .When I contact paypal, they have no solution and never fix it . I'm currently looking for another app.So I can switch, and I guess get rid of PayPal

The only place where scammers are right and can keep your money. And then your account is now flagged because of them. and it causes you to not have full access to your account because "We're having trouble making sure it's you" message for every option you click on in your account for months going on a year soon..

Buying crypto through PayPal is easy, but transferring it out has been a frustrating nightmare. Twice my withdrawals were blocked for 7 days, leaving me without access and no clear explanation. The first customer service rep was fantastic and helpful. The second was clueless, unhelpful, and dismissive. Blocking withdrawals without answers is unacceptable. It is far easier, faster, and more reliable to buy crypto through major exchanges.

Transfer is taking way too long and tells us it's not going to go through until EIGHT (8) DAYS pass. AI support is absolutely awful and did not answer my questions properly then I get told it's not business hours at 1pm on a Tuesday! my account had so many issues just starting up go begin with that the rest of this sent it down to 0 stars but sadly I cannot even do that. PayPal, work on your app and your customer service. until then, this is staying at a 1 star.

They have had my account frozen for a reason they had made up. They say that they have another account that is in my name. There is no such account. They also will not release my CashApp debit card off of the account, which has forced me to close that account and deactivate my card.. They have been shady for quite some time now . SO JUST BEWARE!!!

App isn't secure, at least anymore; it also doesn't work good. I've had money taken from me and not given back by PayPal, and don't feel safe having any money linked with PayPal at all anymore. Also, it is becoming a hub for scammers, and PayPal doesn't seem to care to do much. Also, if you want to use it like a bank account, that doesn't work very well at all. Don't use PayPal anymore.

can't figure out why you can add money no charge but cost $2 if you use the same card to cover the transaction ?? easy to miss if you are used to free transfer but are short on transaction and just select bank card if balance low. generally fine but not heavy user and can be costly if you are not carefully reading each option and find the free way to do it.

Since their last update, PayPal credit is showing as "Unavailable please try again later" which makes it impossible to use. I now have to use the phone automated system to make payments. twice I tried to pay with the app and it gives me the same error. Then it won't show the payment as completed but the regular PayPal section shows the activity as paid. I've been past due twice because of the error. please fix it!

The services are great and the app is easy to use! However, I just realized that when I updated my default credit card, it did not change my card for existing vendors I'd used PayPal for before. While I can understand sometimes one might not want the change to propagate, I was expecting it to have. Please add a notice about the payment method for existing vendors not changing when you update your default, with a link to the page to review. Maybe an option to auto update all to the new default?

This app has gone downhill so quickly with the glut of ads, apps, services and accounts scattered about. I used to be able to go into Paypal and make payments, review statements and account information. Now the app will not allow me to sign into Paypal itself displaying an error message. It's diffcult to find other accounts without accidently clicking an "offer" which is annoying. I assume the sloppy unorganized layout of this app is a reflection of how the designer lives their life.

PayPal has by far the worst customer service of any app I have ever used in my lifetime. Without notice or explanation, they restricted my whole account, meaning I can't use it at all. With no warning and no explanation as to why they did it. So call customer service, right? NO! it is all AI driven! And the stupid AI doesnt route you to a human, it goes in a loop, on purpose I would say, so no help at all. Be very careful because they can shut you down without notice or explanation.

I have not been able to transfer my 36 dollars out of my account to my card in about a week now. I have repeatedly tried to transfer it with different cards, went and updated all my apps, edited settings, I even tried to switch devices and I STILL CANNOT TRANSFER OUT MY MONEY. PLEASE FIX THIS!!!! I've done all the things to try and fix what's wrong, so this is my last resort.

It is incredibly buggy and there's no reason to install it. If you are using PayPal to pay for things then it just directs you to PP website and you pay that way. I thought the app would be a good way to stay on top of my finances and would be easier than the website except the app doesn't really work it just contains adverts. If I go to the web version I can see all my purchases up until yesterday. If I use the app it says I haven't made a single purchase since April.

Not sure what is going on, but I can not log in. First it states they are having trouble, then no internet connection (I'm using my phone and have internet). After the third time, I go to change password and they are having issues connecting. After that, I get a message that I tried to many times and to change password. How can I change password when they are having issues connecting? I even uninstalled and reinstalled and still have issues!!! I want my money that's in there.

They took away PayPal business and completely eliminated the ability to properly duplicate or create invoices through the application. instead, they redirect you to their website that does nothing additional aside from what the app provides, requiring you to use the desktop version if you want to properly invoice your customers. If you rely on PayPal to invoice your customers or maintain your business, I would recommend finding something else.

one of the most convenient ways to do my everyday banking and with their monthly 5% cash back on certain items like fuel that's redeemable throughout the entire month whenever you need a few extra dollars and can redeem your Rewards multiple times as well. not too many other banking apps can beat that. I got about $30 to $40 back a month.

App has become so bloated with unnecessary things. A hassle to reach any preference in relation with the account itself. Even tho I changed the preferred method of online payment. It shows the checkmark on the right card. When I bought something online it charged my previous card. Creating a problem for me. I've had PayPal for 20 years, because I was too paranoid to use my accounts all over. I can now make virtual cards. Was using pp out of habit. But I can risk this happening again.

Hating PayPal now. They have done everything in their power to make this the most inconvenient app now. It was fine the way it was just needed a few tweaks. Good luck shopping online and keeping your privacy when sharing or paying online. How about each time you try to pay online they make you change your password? Talk about frustrating. Good luck trying to keep yourself safe and secure online. I've expressed my concerns, they don't care so I may be leaving after a long time commitment.

Very poor. You have probably accidentally sabotaged the ability to send the receiver of any money a note. The note can not be seen at all while it is being written. You have to click about 3 things to see what words that you are hoping that you are sending and then go back to the keyboard with a couple more clicks. It is terrible so I Hope you can fix it ASAP!!!

PayPal is seriously one of the most convenient apps for managing money online. It‚Äôs quick, secure, and makes sending or receiving payments a breeze, whether you‚Äôre shopping, freelancing, or splitting bills with friends. I appreciate how easy it is to link different accounts and keep track of transactions all in one place. Overall, PayPal just takes the hassle out of digital payments and gives me peace of mind every time I use it.

Annoying app. Many features buried in random places in the UI, it's like navigating a maze. Wanted to change my monthly auto-transfer amount to $10, just to find out that they won't let you do it through their buggy website. So I download the app. I finally find where the setting is, just to find out that they are now forcing you to make it $25 or above. Paypal is not important enough for me to be routing that much money through them. This platform makes for an absolutely rancid experience.

I dont often write reviews. But this app deserves this. I have used PayPal for years, never had an issue. Now all of a sudden with Credit¬∞, I can't add my bank to pay the bill, there was an issue. I can't use debit to pay my bill, it doesn't allow it. I can't use the chat bot to pay my bill. I have to call in, and deal with the automated messaging, which does not allow you to interrupt to say what you want. you have to wait for it to finish before it will acknowledge you. No mas for me.

Stop making it necessary to update the app. It transfers the app back onto my internal storage, which I dont have room in. Just let me keep an old version. It works fine. Seems like something else has changed. It literally worked yesterday, but it crashes when I try to send money now. Cleared cache, didn't help. Erased data, didnt help. reinstalled, didn't help. It gives me a message to wait for an update from the devs to fix the issue. What a waste.

they take security settings way too far. it makes it extremely difficult for me to use, just thinking about withdrawing all of my money and deleting my account. adding PayPal to anything shouldn't ever be this HARD. I'm in a situation where I don't have access to a phone number, and there's no email confirmation option. it's utterly ridiculous to rely on a phone number. the debit card works though, too bad it's utterly useless for anything online. also the fees are way too much, double dippers.

It's okay, there are missing features that haven't come through the Android version of this. One of them is getting a notification of a transaction you've done and showing how much you spent and showing you how much is left in your balance, another thing is transferring money from your bank is the most stupid thing ever. Transferring let's say 20 dollars you'll get charged 15 or higher. There's no option to send the funds in a couple of days or a week without getting charged.

impossible to get much done. the " resolution" center has you write what the problem is, attach documentation, fill out portions, then nothing goes through & you get a " let's try that again", or " something went wrong". tried 3 different times, for 2 situations in 5 months & I will never attempt again. impossible to email a concern, all responses BS. phone number to support: might get someone after half hour or you'll be hung up on. but I guess that's not app related?? Clown Show.

The worst of the online payment platforms I've tried. By design they push you into their fee transactions while the free services they promote don't work for reasons that are impossible to figure out. To be specific, I linked two debit cards that supposedly should have made it possible to add money to my paypal balance for free. Didn't work, no explanation. "We're having trouble.. try again later or with a different debit card". Tried many times over days. Eventually sent money the pay-fee way.

The process is the punishment. If you get scammed, don't count on getting your money back. I contacted support when the fraudulent charge was pending, spoke to 3 live agents, was told I had to wait for it to complete to file a case. 3 weeks pass and I get a generic email asking for the same info. submitted, and another 2 weeks go by with another email asking the same thing. total incompetence. pray you don't need to fix anything through them.

Not the same old PayPal these days. PayPal has really progressed and upgraded the things that you can do inside their app. This is one of the very first payment apps I ever used. Now, I have the old school PayPal credit account, a checking account, a savings account, and really useful cashback Mastercard, not to mention the different ways I can pay overtime with no interest. I recommend this app over all the other cash apps all the time because PayPal still has better security than most!

Since they have chosen to do away with the business app and try to streamline, it has been nothing but a headache with no real answers. Customer list won't transfer over between apps. Pending invoices won't show up. This is the most ridiculous thing Paypal could have ever done. I have used them for years and I am seriously thinking about choosing a different platform.

title: Picsart AI Photo Editor, Video
description:
Ignite your creative potential with Picsart ‚Äî the all-in-one, AI-powered design studio that‚Äôs free and easy to use. From pro-quality business designs to next-gen AI art, Picsart is the perfect companion for any creative project that lets you go from inspiration to creation in a flash. Easily switch scenes with Background Remover, finesse your photos & videos with effects, filters, and powerful photo & video editor tools, create inspiring mood boards with photo collages, and more with a full suite of intuitive graphic design tools.


Kick-start projects with Templates

‚Ä¢ Accelerate your design process with customizable graphic design templates made by professional editors.
‚Ä¢ Make templates your own with just a few taps and create stunning brand logos, social stories, business cards, and more.


Transform designs with Background Remover tools

‚Ä¢ Use advanced AI to create pro-quality product shots for your business.
‚Ä¢ Perfect for online sellers and solopreneurs, Smart Background seamlessly merges contextually suitable backgrounds using easy photo editor tools.
‚Ä¢ Switching backdrops is easy with the Background Remover tool. Make precise changes with easy graphic design editor tools and create fresh aesthetic styles.


Get creative with AI
