summary: Remove and swap backgrounds in your photos and remove unwanted objects

scraped_reviews.content: All of the 5-star reviews are sus. Seems like they've bought positive reviews. This used to be my go-to app for editing and creating. I understand ads supplement for those who use the free version, but it's gotten ridiculous. $26 a month ($312 annually) is an outrageous price for what little you get, and there were STILL ads! You can't even save pictures at a different resolution without paying. I will be using my phone's native editing software and other free products instead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear your frustration, but ads are essential for Picsart and allow us to offer a free version of the app. If you want to create ad-free you can always upgrade to Picsart Gold.

scraped_reviews.content: PicsArt has been my go-to photo editing app for years now. Quick and easy, but has lots of different ways you can alter your photo. I use it all the time when I want a quote or photo from the internet to share, but it's not shareable but I get the person's permission, and screenshot it and size it appropriately. The stickers are endless, even the ones for free. I liked the A.I. filters, but they have changed them, I don't think they're as good now, in my opinion. The image generator is superb

A great app, easiest way to edit things and make images. however, I've been having some bugs lately. The first bug I've had is when I tried to post something and it wouldn't let me make it free to edit. The other bug which happened today was that I was trying to post something and it kept saying there was an error. I restarted my phone after trying countless times to post it, and it's still not letting me post it. Please fix this, thank you.

I've used it for years, never had issues. The free version works great. It's one of the best free editing apps I've tried. Some features take a bit to learn, but once you get it, it's super easy! Edit: 11/11/25 the app's really changed, with too many unnecessary pro options and ads. Picsart used to always auto-save your stuff even if you discard it, but now it has limited storage and you have pay to upgrade/save. The screen calibration for hand/pen is off too, so coloring/drawing is impossible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your long-time support! We're glad you enjoy the app. We acknowledge your concerns about recent changes, especially with auto-saving and storage. Your feedback on screen calibration is noted. Please reach out to support@picsart.com with more details. We appreciate your thoughts and hope you keep exploring the features you love!

scraped_reviews.content: A real shame. I used to use PicsArt all the time. I've had it installed on my phone for years. It is unbelievable how much they have bogged down the free version with ads. Open the app? ad for premium. Download an image you made? Ad for a 3rd party mobile game. Ad on the bottom of the screen while you use it. Half their features, including some basic ones, blocked from use. It's just gotten progressively worse over the last few years. Shame on the app devs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback as a long-time user and are saddened to hear about your experience. Your thoughts on the ad experience and feature limitations are important to us. Please reach out to support@picsart.com with more details or suggestions. We hope you continue to enjoy the app!

scraped_reviews.content: STAY AWAY! So, used to be my go to, was amazing. With ads was fine. When they added a subscription model it was fine. NOW they will not let you save or dowmload your work, without a subscription! They aren't even doing a watermark for those who dont wanna subscribe! ITS THE WORST! Subscription is too expensive for what you get. GGs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your feedback is really important to us, and we appreciate you sharing your thoughts. We recognize your concerns about the subscription model and the limitations on saving or downloading your creations. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Your insights are noted!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for many years and it was very useful for basic photo editing needs but now I can't keep using it. The addition of generative AI content, the paywalling of basic features that used to be free like background removal, and the constant pop-ups trying to get me to subscribe to something I don't want have made me lose interest. If it isn't broken don't fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with the app. We see how recent changes have affected your enjoyment, particularly regarding free features and subscription prompts. Your feedback is important. Please contact support@picsart.com with more details or suggestions. We hope you discover other creative tools that fit your needs!

scraped_reviews.content: much like others, i've used this app for about 7ish years. used to be very straightforward and a few cool features locked behind premium (understandable). now i'm constantly bombarded by popups and ads, i can barely add like 10 stickers without having to start a new project, and every chance it gets it pushes its generative AI, which will always be a turn-off for me with any app that encourages human creativity. i know y'all can be better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your loyalty and understand your concerns about the increase in ads and popups, as well as the focus on generative AI features. Your feedback is invaluable, and we want to ensure your creative experience remains enjoyable. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: 0 STARS! **READ THE CRITICAL REVIEWS!** Their ads are misleading! It let me try the "try on" feature once & then wanted me to pay for a subscription. I didn't really try any of the other editing because I wanted the advertised "see how you look with different hair styles" & I never saw the editor. I used to use the 1st versions of Picsart before AI. I DON'T WANT to pay every time I want to try an edit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's disheartening to hear about your experience with the app. We appreciate your feedback regarding the "try on" feature and the concerns over subscription costs. Your insights are valuable as they highlight areas where we can improve. Please contact support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for years and I hate what it's become. You can't click anywhere without triggering an ad. They randomly force you to sit through videos and there's a permanent banner at the bottom of the screen as you edit. Don't forget the ads for their overpriced membership! When you actually get to edit, so many tools are membership locked. Worst of all, it's become an AI cesspool. It started with a few filters, now PicsArt has completely rebranded as an AI editor. Leave while you can.

I've had this app over 10 years, and I think I'm ready to part ways. Every update makes the app worse and gets rid of even more options that used to be free. Now even cropping a picture degrades the image quality unless you want to pay for the pro. Multiple effects and tools that were free a few months ago are no longer free. So annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your long-term loyalty and completely understand your feelings about the recent changes. It's disheartening to see features you enjoyed become limited. Your feedback is invaluable, and we hope to provide a more satisfying experience in the future. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love this app, for years they've been good about updating features. But now you have to pay them just to export a png instead of a jpg. I need transparent backgrounds often, so now the app is useless for me. Ads have been getting more annoying and invasive over time as well. If you had a one time purchase option I would consider it but I'm not paying $80 a year to edit memes. Looks like Adobe Express has a free mobile version that does have proper export options, so goodbye Picsart
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We truly appreciate your long-term support and are here to listen to your concerns about the recent changes. Your feedback on export options and ad frequency is invaluable. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Your insights help us improve!

scraped_reviews.content: You can't save .pngs without premium anymore. Greed plain and simple. Edit: Maybe you care, but your company certainly doesn't. Like, I know the person responding to this didn't personally change the app, but someone at PicsArt did. Not to be too weird, but there's a cavalcade of issues people have taken with the app and few if any get addressed. This is something anyone can see in your low reviews for themselves.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's disappointing to hear about your concerns regarding saving PNGs and your overall experience with the app. We genuinely appreciate your feedback, as it highlights important issues. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Your voice matters!

scraped_reviews.content: I typically have access to text-to-image generation, and my credits should be available. However, lately, I've encountered issues even after restarting the service. I have a pro account and even tried purchasing additional credits for $2 and $3.99, but I still haven‚Äôt received any credits. It basically took my money and still didn't give me credits. It just keeps saying 0.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It‚Äôs concerning to hear that you‚Äôre not receiving the credits you purchased, especially as a pro account holder. For further assistance, please contact support@picsart.com to share more details about your experience. Your feedback is truly valued, and we hope to resolve this for you soon!

scraped_reviews.content: Actual horrible company(Google never cares about the consumer) So I wanted to download the app cuz it was okay in the past, and I wanted to get back into it, but the first thing that happened after I logged in, was a free trial scam thing where if I tried to exit the page, it would bring up the purchase with card menu and so I had to close and reopen to finally get to the actual image making. So sick and tired of these freaking scummy companies taking advantage of people.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It sounds like your experience with the trial and login process has been quite challenging. We appreciate you sharing this feedback, and we'll take it seriously. If you have more details or suggestions, please contact support@picsart.com. Your insights are important to us, and we hope for a smoother experience for you ahead!

scraped_reviews.content: Too damn glitchy. I've used this for over a year but will not be renewing it again. There are constant issues. and for the last month I haven't been able to copy and paste text onto the images I create. I have to remember it and type it out. And with that, if the text runs under your keyboard pop up on your phone I can't see what I'm trying to edit or type. other issues as well. I'm done with the stress and frustration from an app I use daily.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you sharing your experience, and it‚Äôs clear that the glitches and text editing issues have caused you stress. Your feedback is invaluable, and we‚Äôve escalated this internally to help improve the experience. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. We hope for better days ahead!

scraped_reviews.content: Used this app for years!! but unfortunately now you can't even make simple creations without them trying to force you to pay. like I used to be able to use all the free editing options with no problem now you can't even save the image you need saved without then asking you to pay. Very upsetting for someone who's always come back to this app. but I'm not paying 8+$ for a membership when I only use the app maybe once every 3 months.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Peony Days, it's disappointing to hear your experience has changed after years of enjoying the app. We value your loyalty and your concerns about the current limitations on free features. Please contact support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Your feedback is important, and we look forward to enhancing your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: if I could give zero stars, I would. you cannot even SAVE anything without paying (even when you are NOT using paid features). the app is worthless now. why even have it be free to download and include free features if you can't even save what you create? the app was NOT like this when I started using it. I honestly wouldn't mind paying for it, but, there's already ads in the free version and they charge too much for access, imo.

I need to subscribe to "Pro" every time i have spent time editing photos because I inevitably use a "pay only" feature to edit my photos...so after all that work, I cannot save the picture without subscribing.... argh!!! it happens every time. that is frustrating to have wasted my time and creative flow because I cannot afford the subscription in order to save them!!! Time I will never get back again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback on the subscription model. It can be tough to feel limited in your efforts. Your experience is important to us, and we‚Äôre taking your comments seriously. If you have more details or suggestions, please reach out to support@picsart.com. Thank you for sharing your thoughts!

scraped_reviews.content: Started out great but has slowly become almost unusable over the last 2 years as more and more standard tools are locked behind a paywall. About 80% of the things I used to use it for are unavailable. I'm talking really simple things like a one-touch brush removing someone's pimple. I understand locking certain things to pro-mode, but when more and more tools go there every day, rather than paying, we just use it less and less. Sorry, but this app has never been good enough to cost $72 a year.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding the paywall concerns. It's disappointing to hear the app isn't meeting your expectations. Your insights are important to us, and we aim to enhance the experience for all users. Feel free to contact support@picsart.com with more details or suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a long time user here on Picsart, and I've absolutely loved and enjoyed my time with it. Over the years more and more features are locked behind a pay-wall and it's so upsetting. Just recently more of the different fonts have gotten locked unless you pay for the upgraded plans. Time to find a different app because this is utterly ridiculous!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your loyalty and are glad you've enjoyed using the app. We recognize your concern about features being locked, and your feedback is invaluable. Please feel free to reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Thank you for being a part of our community!

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be my go-to app. But this is super expensive now. And they now require you to pay for things that used to be free (save as png, letterpacks previously paid for now inaccessible without paying for the subscription) They also removed options that were available before (Adding a picture layer so that it lines up perfectly without needing to resize. Now even with an expensive subscription the option is unavailable). This app is going downhill and will continue do so by the looks of it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding the recent changes in pricing and features. We recognize that some options you valued are no longer available. Your input is important, and we‚Äôre dedicated to improving your experience. Please reach out to support@picsart.com with any details or suggestions. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Not only have they increased the cost to generate a motion photo by a factor of ten. $20 for 10 pics @5 sec a piece. THAT'S LESS THAN A MINUTE! And the results are absolute garbage! Despite your greatest efforts, the app will ignore all prompts and simply add a lighting effect to your "animated" image. Subscription cancelled. You should be ashamed of yourselves.

This app is a total scam. I paid $78 for the Pro Plan which gives me 500 monthly credits. I also paid an additional $38 for 400 mor credits and I've received nothing but a prompt to buy more credits. Eventhough my balance inaccurately shows 150 credits, the app won't even let me use those. RUN away as quickly as possible. It sucks that Picsart is forcing me to submit a complaint to the Better Business Bureau. I have to at least try to prevent other people from getting scammed like I did :/

Tester beware. I downloaded this software to test it and see if it could meet my needs. It wasn't quite what I needed so I deleted the app within 60min of downloading it. I cancelled the required subscription as well -- or thought I did. There was an error somewhere and I was still charged for an annual subscription. I emailed the company, sure a refund would be no problem as I was prompt. All I got back was an auto email saying they never issue refunds for any reason.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback regarding the subscription and the response you received. Your concerns have been escalated internally to help us improve. If you have more details or suggestions, please reach out to support@picsart.com. We hope you find an app that meets your needs!

scraped_reviews.content: Creators have gotten greedy - it won't save more than 1 photo without forcing you to pay, and the price is steep for what little you get. On top of that, it's now overrun with ads and weird AI filters. These are both banner and VIDEO ads - the video will come up when you press the save button, before it directs you to the subscription price, of course. Been a user for years and have now deleted the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback as a long-time user. Your concerns about pricing, ad interruptions, and recent app changes are important to us. Please reach out to support@picsart.com with more details or suggestions. Your insights help us improve, and we look forward to enhancing your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: Have been using this app for 10 years and I wake up today to find that the blemish feature, where you can remove certain blemishes or items, is under the PLUS membership now. Very disappointed that it's blocked behind a paywall now because this app stood out amongst other photo editing apps because of this feature. There's only monthly and yearly subscriptions too, not even a one-time payment option. Not using this until blemish is brought back or a one time subscription is available.

Normally I love this app! I have bought the annual pass for it for a few years now. Sadly the last few months the font won't actually change colors from black or white, even the outline isn't working. Now I'm trying to find font elsewhere to add in and I am sick of doing this for the last 4 or so months that I'm here writing hoping this can be corrected! Note: My app is up to date. I have tried uninstalling and re-installing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's great to hear you've enjoyed the app for so long! We appreciate your loyalty and are aware of the persistent font color issue. Your experience is important to us, so please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details. We look forward to improving your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: Picsart used to be my go to app when creating content for my online profile, but recently, Picsart has made the app completely unusable by adding in way too many in app purchases. I can't even create a collage and download it without them expecting me to pay an insane amount of money for the "Pro" version. Downloading is an advanced feature? Quite frankly, I'm pissed off and upset. I hope they lose money this way rather than gaining any.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback and acknowledge your concerns about the recent changes in the app regarding in-app purchases. It's disheartening to hear this has impacted your experience. Your insights are valuable, and we‚Äôll make sure to take them into account. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Worked great, now ads interfere with editing. Ads will pop up in the middle of the screen with no notice and if you accidentally tap on it (or sometimes even if you don't because some ads will take you straight to the play store regardless), you lose whatever you were working on. Edit: thanks for the response. I understand the need for ads, but because they pop up while editing and some force you to the play store, it doesn't save your work and you have to start over. It renders the app useless
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear your frustration, but ads are essential for Picsart and allow us to offer a free version of the app. If you want to create ad-free you can always upgrade to Picsart Gold.

scraped_reviews.content: The app didn't do what I needed it for, no big deal, so I unsubscribed less than an hour after I started the trial. Even double checked in my Google Play subscriptions and it said it was canceled. End of the trial came up and I was still charged. Did a refund request and explained that. They DID process the refund, but it says it can take up to THIRTY days to post to your account. $90 is a lot of money to pull, unauthorized, and then not return for 30 days... Shady shady shady.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you sharing your experience regarding the refund process. It's understandable to be concerned about the timing of the charge and refund. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Your feedback is valuable, and we hope for a swift resolution for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for so many years... I used to use it almost every day. It was really great. But now, I can't save a picture. Because I have to pay ü•≤ It was fine at first, I just used some effects & stickers. Edit: I always used the free version, filters & stickers. But it still won't let me save, it wanted me to pay to have more storage space. I sent a message to their Gmail but it seems like I wasn't understood. I didn't buy a subscription, I can't save. Nice app, what a pity.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please contact us at support@picsart.com and we might be able to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app. This is the easiest, most convenient "Photoshop" I ever used. Years ago everything was free. Now, those features are paid, which I dislike. Also, I'd like to see some 3D assets added to the app like 3D text, vectors, etc. I used to use this app instead of Photoshop when I was on the go, but now, many things are missing from the app, which, if it had, would make it even more incredible and a very good alternative to many other programs and apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback. While some features are paid, we also offer many free options to enjoy. Your satisfaction is essential to us, and we're continuously working to improve your experience. If you have any specific suggestions on how we can make the app better for you, please let us know by contacting us at support@picsart.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't get me wrong, this app has helped me a LOT of times ever since I downloaded it way back then but the amount of ads it pops up just to click on some of their free tools is insane. I can't even attach another photo to the main edit without getting 3 ads. I get that it's a way of earning cash and advertising the premium but come on, it's getting tedious to work with.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear your frustration, but ads are essential for Picsart and allow us to offer a free version of the app. If you want to create ad-free you can always upgrade to Picsart Gold.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using PicsArt for years. I've seen the great development. I subscribed & loved the premium features of this app specially the "unlimited AI" effects. And now you can only have about 6 maximum and then you're gonna have to make another payment and its quite expensive. Its becoming greedy. Very disappointing ü´§ I have never been so disappointed in an app until this. I thought PicsArt would always be this humble. I guess its time to find a new app ü´§
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We've updated our subscription plans to enhance your experience and provide better value across our tools. We understand this change may be different from what you‚Äôre used to, but we believe it offers a more flexible and efficient service. If you have questions, we're here to help.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app!!! :D! The range of all the cute stickers and photos people make. It's quite good to show your art! The thing is, though, whenever I put stickers on my photo piece, I can only put on 4 stickers. This makes me have to go into drawing mode. I want it to get fixed! Clearly, not only 4 at a time! I want like atleast 8 or more...

Disappointed when app does not disclose fees before d/l & no real support to learn before fees are required. Uninstaller or better yet ... don't bother downloading if you only want free editing. I tried again bc I liked a previous version of picsart where I could freehand draw or incorporate images from image files and art them up. Was great previously but I can't get behind the money gouges, not worth $79 on a cell when same dollars buys full funtioning laptop software. Buhbye!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Picsart will continue providing a free version of the app, and subscribing to Picsart Premium plans is entirely optional. By opting for Picsart Premium you not only enjoy an ad-free editing experience, full access to our video editor, and all premium content, but also unlock cool AI tools to enhance your creativity.

scraped_reviews.content: It amazes me how many complain about apps requiring fees to use advanced features. Should th be devs just work for free like you crybabies do? Didn't think so. However, some apps are so full of ads you can't even use basic so called free functions are bs. There needs to be more balance! What more app devs should do is offer to watch an ad to use an advanced feature once for those who can't afford real money. I'd glady watch a 60 second ad to use a feature once on a photo. Think about it!

Beware when you subscribe! I just needed one job done with the app, so I subscribed for a month. Then I got a notification that I paid the full year subscription of ¬£45. I understand that if you don't cancel it automatically subscribes you, but it's fine printed and not fair. I would consider fair to automatically renew for another month if you don't cancel, but a year?? That to me is a way to get the most money possible from whomever forgets to unsubscribe. Borderline fraudulent. BEWARE!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the subscription process. We appreciate your feedback and acknowledge your concerns regarding the automatic renewal. If you have more details or suggestions, please reach out to support@picsart.com. We hope you continue to explore the app and find value in its features!

scraped_reviews.content: Really going downhill fast with the AI implementation. Recently has started uploading all of my edits without my permission, which is really frustrating as a lot of them are pictures of myself or my family. Stop trying to turn into a social media app! It was a fantastic editing app! It never needed to be more than that and it is really at the detriment to the users.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about the recent changes and understand your concerns regarding privacy with your edits. Your experience is important to us, and we're grateful for your insights. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Your input is invaluable!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, it's so easy to find the different edits. I had previously given it 2* because it was crashing all the time (that was a couple of years ago) so I uninstalled it. I have now installed it again and it has, once again, become my primary photo editor. Well done Picsart for fixing the issues. üëèüëèüëè I have the free version and find they are pretty generous with the edits they give.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's fantastic to hear that you're enjoying the app and finding it user-friendly! We're truly grateful for your feedback and thrilled that the improvements have positively impacted your experience. Thank you for sharing your journey with us!

scraped_reviews.content: Peak. I'll be honest with you, I don't really have money on me. So I was desperately looking for Picsart back in 2020, to make YouTube Video Thumbnails. Now, as much as I don't make thumbnails anymore, any type of editing, coloring and just customizing your photo's. This app has. I needed to outline a specific part of a very small logo. I assumed the app wouldn't really be able to identify what I'm trying to outline, but it did. That's the thing wt this app. It does know. It actually works.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your honest feedback! We're so glad to hear that the app has supported your creative endeavors, especially with editing and customizing photos. It's wonderful that you found it effective for outlining your logo‚Äîyour confidence in its capabilities truly means a lot to us. Enjoy your editing journey!

scraped_reviews.content: Picsart *USED* to be an amazing App. I used it like almost everyday to edit photos and pictures. I stopped using it for a while and now once i came back i found out you can like actually edit? Super amazing! but now it has gotten wat ti complicated, it just frustrates me and give up. Im losing possible views on tiktok from rants by not editing but it has gotten TOO dificult.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's great to hear you love using the app daily and enjoy the editing features! We value your feedback on the complexity and are dedicated to improving the experience. Feel free to reach out to support@picsart.com with more details or suggestions. Your creativity deserves to shine on TikTok!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a paying customer for for 3 years.. It's been great until the last update. Now it crashes while using. I reached out to support and got one reply, suggesting I do something I already did. I haven't heard a whisper since. I'm currently looking for a different app. I hope they fix their bugs but if they don't I need to be prepared. It's already cost me sales. Used to be a good app, wish their customer service or support was better... To Picsart. Contact support? Really? Just fix it..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your loyalty over the past three years and truly value your feedback. It's concerning to hear about the crashes and your experience with support. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details. Your input is crucial, and we hope to restore your confidence in the app soon.

scraped_reviews.content: so many old features I'd use not even five years ago are now behind a paywall. ads ads ads galore. used to be normal ads but no now there is one every time you try to start a new project, open up a new image, save an image, etc. hilarious because the pc version of Picsart is not nearly this straining to use. definitely will be trying out other options before I come back to this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about feeling overwhelmed by the app changes, including the paywall and ads. Your thoughts are important to us. Please reach out to support@picsart.com with any details or suggestions. We hope you find a solution that suits your needs!

scraped_reviews.content: absolutely disgusting. okay, so for years, PNGs have been a free part of the editing software, now suddenly its a paid for feature? I loved and recommended picsart to EVERYONE I knew with a love for editing because of how accessible it was to everyone. Greedy. I'm absolutely disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your passionate feedback and understand your disappointment regarding the recent changes to the PNG feature. Your input is important as we strive to create a better experience for all users. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: terrible. no help menu to answer any minimal questions you might have. not that it would work anyway never does. nothing is intuitive at all unless I guess you're 12 years old. whatever I think the different functions seem to mean based on the words they use is never what they actually do. It's just a useless pointless exercise in frustration with no way to find out how to use the app before they force you to subscribe to it, so it's just a waste of time. no faq's. no index. no directory.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about the lack of guidance within the app. It‚Äôs clear that you‚Äôre feeling overwhelmed, and having clear instructions is essential. Your insights are invaluable, and we‚Äôll take them into consideration as we enhance the user experience. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Selling outüëéüèæ I've been using the app since it was first released and while I understand charging for some features is reasonable the reason the app was so great in my opinion was the abundance of free features available for use. Now it almost like you can't do any high quality work in the app without paying for it because almost everything is being converted to "plus" only. Feels like a real low blow
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your long-time support and recognize your concerns about the shift in available features. It can be disheartening to feel limited in your creative options. Your feedback is invaluable as we work to enhance the user experience. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: It's getting more and more difficult to use simple features which stinks because I used to really enjoy this app for editing. Every update you have to find work arounds (if you aren't a paid user) to use this app at all. I used to be a paid member but I use it a handful of times in a year and the expense is just too high. I wish they had an option to pay for say 25/50/100/200 uses versus having to pay monthly. I feel like this would be a better fit and something I'd repurchase
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback on the challenges with accessing features and your thoughts on payment options. It‚Äôs clear you have a strong connection to the app, and we value your insights. Please reach out to support@picsart.com to share more details or suggestions. Keep creating!

scraped_reviews.content: mostly good, but the update only lets you save in the jpeg format now if you don't pay a subscription. What's the point in letting you have transparent backgrounds if they don't save as a background? PNG is a pretty standard format, so putting it behind a paywall is ludicrous. Also, anything you cut out in editing attempts to post as a sticker, really stupid feature.

title: Traveloka: Book Hotel & Flight
description:
Traveloka ‚Äì Flights, Hotels, Promos, and Travel Deals

Looking for a hassle-free way to book your entire trip? Traveloka is the complete travel app offering affordable flights, cheap airline tickets, hotel bookings, travel tickets, attractions, car rentals, and airport transfer services ‚Äî all in one place.

Daily Travel Deals and Promos
Enjoy exclusive travel promos every day for both domestic and international travels. From air fare to hotel bundles, Traveloka helps you find the best cheap flights, accommodations, and activities at the most competitive prices.

Flight Booking Made Easy
Find and book cheap airline tickets with our powerful flight finder. Choose from over 100,000 routes from trusted airlines including:
Singapore Airlines, Scoot, Jetstar, AirAsia, Malaysia Airlines, Emirates, Etihad, Qatar Airways, Qantas, Virgin Australia, and more.

Search by destination, compare air ticket prices, and book instantly. Whether it's a business trip or a weekend getaway, Traveloka offers the best deals on air plane tickets and air fare.

Hotel and Resort Booking Worldwide
Traveloka makes it simple to find the perfect stay. Choose from over 100,000 hotels, resorts, apartments, villas, and glamping sites worldwide.
Enjoy flexible options like "Pay at Hotel" and "Pay Near Stay Date" to book last-minute. Daily hotel promos available from major chains including Accor and Ibis.

Rent Cars and Use Airport Transfer Services
Book ground transportation with ease. Choose from a wide selection of vehicles with or without a driver using Traveloka Car Rental. Use our airport transfer service to get to your hotel or next location quickly after landing.

Tickets for Attractions and Activities
Discover and book attractions, events, and experiences easily. From Disneyland, LEGOLAND, and Universal Studios, to local tours and theme parks ‚Äî find it all in one app.
Enable location access to activate personalized trip ideas and nearby recommendations.

Cruise Packages ‚Äì A New Way to Travel
Looking for something different? Book the latest cruise packages with Traveloka. Set sail on international routes and get access to exclusive travel deals that combine air tickets and cruise benefits in one booking.

Traveloka Priority ‚Äì More Benefits, More Savings
Join the All-New Traveloka Priority program to earn Traveloka Points and Priority XP with every transaction. Redeem points for discounts, rewards, and faster tier upgrades. The more you use Traveloka, the more you save.

Reliable Customer Support 24/7

Available 24/7 through phone, chat, and email

Multilingual team fluent in English, Indonesian, Malay, Thai, and Vietnamese

Get instant help via IVAN, our in-app Intelligent Virtual Assistant

Stay Connected and Inspired
Follow Traveloka on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and X for the latest travel trends, promo updates, cheap airline offers, and cheaptickets.

Download the Traveloka app now and book your next trip with ease. Whether it's flights, resorts, rent cars, or attractions, Traveloka makes travel simpler and more affordable.

scraped_reviews.content: Traveloka is honestly one of the most frustrating apps I‚Äôve ever used. Every time I try to book a hotel or flight, the payment page shows an error, but the money still gets deducted. This has happened more than once and it‚Äôs ridiculous. It‚Äôs stressful, confusing, and makes you worry if your booking even went through. How can a company that handles people‚Äôs money have such a broken system? I‚Äôm completely done with this app. If you value your time and peace of mind, stay far away from Traveloka.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Loyal Traveloka Users, we apologize for the issue with your booking. Unfortunately, we cannot find a case that matches your description in our system. For further verification, please contact us via email at cs@traveloka.com. Our team is ready to assist you and find the best solution. Thank you. -NM

scraped_reviews.content: If you're a first timer using this app, DO NOT ATTEMPT TO RESERVE ANYTHING WITHOUT SUPERVISION! The app is confusing with so many ads in the middle of reservation and when you arrive at the location the hotel/apartment staff DOESN'T EVEN UNDERSTAND ABOUT WHAT TO DO BECAUSE APPARENTLY THE TRAVEL STAFF IS NOT ALWAYS THERE! Truly such professional behavior. This will be my last time using this cursed app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Traveloka Loyal Customer, we are sorry for the trouble with your booking. We can't locate any case matching your description in our system. To assist you in resolving the issue, please communicate with us through email to cs@traveloka.com. Our team is ready to resolve the issue and we appreciate your patience. -AN

scraped_reviews.content: Friendly UI, easy and practice to use, various payment method to choose for our convenience, last but not the least, the best travel app to browse for local Indonesian hotels, villa and the various mode of transportation choices. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you very much for the positive review. Stay tuned for more exciting updates and offers on Traveloka!

scraped_reviews.content: I am very disappointed with Traveloka‚Äôs service. I made a mistake in my flight booking and realised it immediately after payment, but the app did not allow me to contact customer service for immediate help. The system automatically switched my travel route from Singapore ‚Üí Taipei to Taipei ‚Üí Singapore, and despite trying to amend it right away, there was no option to correct or reverse it. I was told I cannot make any changes or refunds, even though the flight date is still several days away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jasmine, we're sorry to hear that there's an issue with your booking. Please be rest assured that our team is currently working on it. We'll solve it through the related case number 449xxx31 and keep you updated via email until it's resolved. Thank you for your patience. -AL

scraped_reviews.content: I selected English as the language, but the app still displays content in Thai. As a foreigner, it's difficult to understand important details‚Äîespecially the terms and conditions of promotions. I lost points due to unclear information, and Traveloka refused to take responsibility. Additionally, customer service showed no empathy or willingness to help. Because of this poor experience, I‚Äôve uninstalled the app and will not be using it again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Hyuk, we're sorry to hear that there's an issue with your booking. Unfortunately, we were unable to find any case matching your description in our system. To help us understand the problem, please contact us through email cs@traveloka.com. Our team is ready to assist you and find a solution as quickly as possible. Thank you. -AL

scraped_reviews.content: Apps that are easy to use for customers who are using it for the first time, for example I experienced a problem and made a mistake in filling in flight ticket information, I contacted customer service via chat only, the officer's name was Jessi, very very calm, she tried her best to help me solve this problem. and everything was solved easily when I gave the correct information.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We are so grateful for your support. We hope you continue to enjoy our products and offers. If you have any additional feedback or suggestions, feel free to chat with our Customer Service by tapping the chat bubble icon at the top right of the Traveloka App homepage. Our team would be delighted to assist you. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't book through this app unless you're 100% sure you will never need a refund. My husband's passport was damaged so we legally couldn't board our international flight. We tried to call but they redirected us to a useless AI chatbot in their app. It took some time to find the button to talk to an actual human. Even after these hurdles, Traveloka refused a full refund for this legitimate emergency. Zero empathy, predatory policies, designed to frustrate customers into accepting losses.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nadya, we apologize for the inconvenience. As per airline policy, refunds are processed according to their official procedures. After checking, the issue has been resolved under report number 44***058. We‚Äôve also sent a message through the app to follow up and ensure everything is fine. Thank you for your understanding and feedback. -HM

scraped_reviews.content: ‚ÄãI missed my flight from Bali to Jakarta because of a six-hour traffic jam caused by severe weather. ‚ÄãDespite calling ahead, customer service called it a "personal issue" offered no help and 10% refund. this was the worst service I have ever received. ‚ÄãBe careful when booking with this company, especially for flights from locations unpredictable weather.

scraped_reviews.content: Extremely Disappointed ‚Äì Be Cautious When Booking! I am very disappointed with Traveloka. My recent experience was frustrating and unacceptable. scraped_reviews.content: what is wrong with Traveloka.?"I used to check and book flight tickets and hotels because I trusted it. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Suraj, we apologize for the inconvenience. Upon checking, it appears the issue has been resolved. Thank you for using our app. -DK

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded this app with high hopes, but I haven‚Äôt even been able to register successfully. I tried multiple times across several days, thinking it might be a temporary glitch. Still no luck. Then I noticed an update was available and hoped it would fix the issue. Unfortunately, even after updating, the registration fails with the same message:"Sorry, there is an error in our system. Please try again after a while." Seriously? How many times is ‚Äúa while‚Äù? It‚Äôs frustrating and disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jeanette, we're sorry to hear that you had trouble accessing our app. To help us investigate the issue, could you please send us a screenshot of the error via email cs@traveloka.com. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your cooperation. Thank you. -AL

scraped_reviews.content: Traveloka used to stated the price we paid for hotel/flight including the taxes, fee, etc at front. Now, it's different. In the front it was stated the price was IDR 400K, the when i clicked the payment page it changed to IDR 500k++, it's frustrating. I used to love this app so much compared to other app bc it tells you the amount of price you have to paid in front, no lie, no additions. Now, it's same like other apps. I know the economy is bad, but cmmon, don't lower your quality.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Callope, we apologize for the inconvenience. If you have any other questions, please contact us via email cs@traveloka.com. Thank you. -BM

scraped_reviews.content: The app is easy to use and convenient. I often use it to book hotels, the rooms are described fully and specifically, easy to compare between places. Recently I had a booking error, but the app contacted and resolved it quickly. I am very impressed with this, because in addition to a machine running smoothly, the way it handles problems is equally important.

title: WebNovel
description:
‚ô• Read the novel and comic version of the hottest anime ‚Äì Solo Leveling (Only I Level Up)! 

Introducing the all-new WebNovel ‚Äì your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures. 

Discover a treasure trove of novel genres that will transport you to realms beyond your imagination. The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all‚Äîwe've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel ‚Äì where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

Featured genres: Mystery, Eastern Fantasy, Western Fantasy, Sci-fi, Fan-fic, Xianxia, Xuanhuan, Wuxia, Romance, Adventure Mangas, Comics, Manhua, Webtoon

Original and Exclusive Novels: Supreme Magus, My Vampire System. Shadow Slave

Translated and exclusive novels: Library of Heaven's Path, Lord of the Mysteries, She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment

Exclusive Comic/Manga/Manhua/Manhwa/Webtoon: Beauty and the Beast, When Beauty meets Beasts

Interested in writing or having a story that you seek to share? Start now by joining thousands of aspiring authors through sharing your stories on WebNovel. ‚ÄúThe journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.‚Äù Join our various contests and publish your novel with our matchmaking system to millions of readers who share a similar interest in your genre. Find your voice and share your message with the world.

Multiple book genres await you to explore on WebNovel, from epic fantasies to hundreds of thousands of unique fanfictions. 

Anyone can find novels/comics/manga/manhua/fanfics/webtoons that they are interested in on WebNovel. Try it out now without any further delay!

Privacy PolicyÔºöhttps://www.webnovel.com/privacy_policy
Terms of ServiceÔºöhttps://www.webnovel.com/terms_of_service
Agreement for Subscription ServicesÔºöhttps://activity.webnovel.com/noah/20220926/subscriptionservices

*****Follow us on WebNovel social media*****

Twitter : https://twitter.com/webnovel
IG : https://www.instagram.com/thewebnovel/
FB : https://www.facebook.com/webnovel/
Website : https://www.webnovel.com/
Forum : https://forum.webnovel.com/
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/AeYDMQw

summary: WebNovel - Read Solo Leveling novel and comic

scraped_reviews.content: Won't open on Pixel 10 Pro XL. Maybe Android 16 as a whole but idk. Crazy expensive if you read a lot. There are fast passes you can get from watching ads and whatnot to get free chapters but you can only get about 2-3 per day. I spent $20 and ran out after a single day. I don't spend any money on it anymore, but I'd spend $15/month on a subscription if I could read for free. They could even do like Kindle Unlimited and just have a selection of novels available for free with a subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We have fixed the issue and you can try upgrading to the latest version.

scraped_reviews.content: Fast passes and points that you earn the most won't transfer to coins. Then when you want to use the fastpass for the book you are reading, you can't because the one book you are reading, doesn't qualify for fast pass. I have tons of points and for what, some stupid badges. All these book apps are money grabs and it sucks. The only one worth paying for is Galatea, there you pay for the year (reasonable price) and you get unlimited reading.

The stories are pretty good, but after a few chapters they all require to be paid for to be unlocked, and I get that it's to support the writers, but it's a hassle to have to wait for 2 weeks to be able to read for free for 24 hours, but at least the possibility of reading free is on the table. Also, the 'advanced search' isn't actually advanced. They just have the popular tags for stories, so if you want to find a gl, good luck because that's not on the advanced search but bl is.

So far, this is a fantastic reading service, Although you are limited with how far you can read in books, you can, however, get free reading past that point through certain activities. plus, sometimes you get to read for free for 24 hours. The translations, although sometimes a bit bad, are usually pretty good. plus, it's not just for novels like the name suggests, but it also has comics.

Tons of fun adventures! It's easy to use, and you really do save the most buying an entire book at once. It sounds expensive at a few hundred dollars for the biggest series, but you have to figure it breaks down to a little cheaper than buying the paperbacks. MVS for example was a few hundred, but it broke down to the equivalent of about 45 books... so ... think about it.

The app is a mixed bag and not in the good way. If there was an alternative I'd use that instead. Expensive for what you get, 10 cents for a "chapter" that is a few pages. definatepy more costly than buying finish publiched novels. Fake reviews are an issue too. Not good on the battery life either. There are a few diamond in the rough novels on this platform hence why it's not 1 star.

The text-to-speech that allows you to listen to the books frequently freezes. Walk outside the range of your wifi? Freeze. Sometimes it can run for hours with no glitch, then all of a sudden freezes. Clearing the cache, still frozen. Reinstalling, still frozen. Restarting your phone, still frozen. Daily check in sometimes does not know what day it is. Check in today to save your streak? Nope, you "missed" an imaginary day and need to watch ads to keep your streak going.

This is a scam app do not pay for anything you will be ripped off. I paid for the basic subscription but was not receiving the daily coins. Talked a service rep and was told I don't receive any daily coins (that are included in the plan) if I didn't login that day, but this is not stated in the subscription plan. So I have only received 4 days of coins even though I've had the subscription for coming on 3 weeks.

new user. my first book was "free to read" for 24 hours, but the last 25 chapters were locked, so I came back to earn points and fast passes to read the locked chapters...and the app sent me to a chapter I already read, which I unlocked and then realized it. I paid for the next one with points or whatever, then went back to customer service and they said they couldn't see anything strange, so they couldn't refund me. don't bother joining. it's infuriating. other book apps are much better

The stories on the app are good but that's the only thing I like about this app at all. There's no way to get coins for new chapters unless you subscribe and paying 20 dollars for a thousand coins basically isn't worth it. Especially if you are someone like me who reads multiple stories at a time. Do not get this app unless you want to pay a fortune to read a book!!!!!!!!!!

I have been using this app for many years now, and the price has been steadily going up while the free fast passes are going down. Not to mention the fass passes you get are for genres I am not reading. It has a good selection of stories but I can't even open the links to the events to even get some of the free stuff. Can definitely do better.

The short story chapters can't be purchased with coins they can't be unlocked with videos. I shouldn't have to pay $14.99 for a subscription when I only want to read a short story. I think I'll just delete my profile and leave webnovel. I thought it was a good app, but it's not. Translations all over the place, grammar just out the window, and although I think having a multitude of ways to read those long books without paying is good, the same should go for the short stories.

Good, but not great. After a certain point, it becomes tedious to unlock chapters. There should definitely be episodes/chapters unlocked daily and there should be a system in place that lets you earn fast passes freely, not limited to specific novels/genres. Fast passes also should not have a limit of 5 or 6 a day. You should also be able to choose when to use vouchers instead of them automatically being used as soon as you acquire them. Otherwise, I enjoy the stories. At least what I can of em.

This is my first time reading web novels before. The quality is what I expected, some things get by as there isn't a long editing/review process. Sometimes these mistakes make me stumble while reading, but the stories are worth staying for. the WebNovel system of unlocking books makes everything much more expensive or time intensive than it should be so that is by far the most annoying thing. I would rather just pay a few dollars and get the whole book.

i downloaded the app and got it all set up. i read until it asked for money , and I bought $4.99 of points, and figured it would let me read the rest of the comic. nope! i got like one more chapter. so I paid $4.99 again to read some more, because it said the next bit was only 30 points, so I bought the 250 points thinking i could finish the story now, right? $10 in I should get one story nope! somehow 2 min more reading and suddenly my balance is too low to continue. I am deleting the app.

So this is actually a really great app. I'm ranking it as 2 stars because it is near-impossible for free users if your interest are what is featured. if you want to read something specific, you won't be able to without watching an ad for every single page, multiple ads per page as you continue. If you don't mind spending money, this is a phenomenal app. I'm just a cheapskate who wanted to read without paying.

Worst reading app I've found, and that's saying something. Fast passes are a joke because you have to use several and they have to be the right kind. Coins are almost impossible to earn unless you spend $. It can take days to earn enough to unlock even 1 chapter. I was just rewarded a "sitewide unlock for 1.5 hours" and it actually only lasted <15 mins and 3 chapters. I DO NOT recommend using this app. Spare yourself the frustration.

was 5 now, 1. was fine with the audio feature, then it changed in the middle of a chapter. sounds less organicand my preferred reading speed is no longer available (I.E. too fast or too slow). can no longer choose the voice...( Where is Sonia?!) The PLAY and PAUSE function no longer works with external input (I.E. headphone or speaker controls), and now there are pauses between sentences or "tracks" where there were none before. CHANGE IT BACK!!

I subscribed hoping to binge a single series, but the monthly plan only gave ~500 coins‚Äîfar too little, leaving most chapters locked. At that rate it would take years to finish. When I asked support (Carlo) for help, they explained the system isn‚Äôt designed for binge readers, and they refused a refund even though I hadn‚Äôt used a coin. Very misleading and not reader-friendly. I can‚Äôt recommend this app to anyone who wants to actually enjoy their stories.

the app itself has an amazingly easy way to find things that you want to read. if you're fine with bubble with text in them floating by while you're reading and sometimes even blocking what you're reading. then the comic section is good for you. because I haven't check to see if it's on everything else. I've spent a good 15 minutes trying to disable that function so I am able to read.

cash grab, plain and simple. Don't waste your money and time - there is no way to consistently read at even a slow pace on this app without paying a fortune. I purchased a subscription and still am not able to read more than 85 chapters of a 2600 chapter novel without running out of their made up currency. Save yourself some heartache and just buy paper books instead. Truly wish I could have read the fantasy novels here, but I am unwilling to support predatory pricing practices.

So, I've been using the app for the longest time, years now. But they, as of today, just added ads that sit on the bottom of the page of whatever book you are reading. Surprisingly, this pulls my focus away from the book I'm reading very easily, making it difficult to focus on my reading immersion... I don't know if I'll be long for the platform, sadly.

Around 4 years ago I paid for 3/4 books on the then site for this app. The books were good and I was looking forward to going back and re-reading them. Fast forward to a couple weeks ago I started reading a book on social media and liked the story so I downloaded the app and low and behold there were the books that I had already paid for and enjoyed. Today I went to start re-reading one and suddenly its asking me to pay to unlock them AGAIN. Waste of money if you can't keep the content.

Very disappointed with the app I know that no app is completely free. However, there are way too many unnecessary things and it's very difficult to unlock chapters without paying being the only option. I was reading a book and really enjoyed it, but it was overly complicated. Unlike other apps where all I have to do is watch a few ads or read a couple of articles. To be honest I'm going to uninstall this app.

Love reading on the app but the different pass types should be done away with especially when it doesn't seem like they are personalized. I've been trying to get through a couple of books and I keep getting genre and specific book passes that I dont and havent read unless trying to receive a sitewide fastpass. Honestly, it seems a little money hungry cause you have to essentially buy coins to actually get through a book. Of course it's not so bad if you also read on other apps

Scammers offer a week for 99 cents. Then, 2 days later, they charge 29.99, which is crazy expensive. They refused to refund me, saying they made right with an author, which is odd. the deal was for a week. Avoid this service at all costs. Especially since now most of these authors are being published on Amazon, and you can get the full book way cheaper and you find most of these on reddit as well. Also, many of the stories on her are plagiarized,and when you inform them,they do nothing about it.

Initial review: 2018 (5 stars) Easy to use, has lots of choices, and generally a good app to waste spare time or when you are bored. Update: 2025 (3 stars) Much more ads now, especially with the ads that you are forced to see at the bottom of the screen, I've become used to just closing it but everytime you go to a new chapter it is there. to be honest, if they would implement a system where you can pay to not have ads at the bottom of the screen I would do it, but there isnt :(

Not bad until you realize it'll take 2-6 months to earn enough points/Fast Passes to unlock all the chapters of an entire novel if you don't want to buy coins to unlock them. If you do want to buy coins, the amount of coins it takes to unlock all chapters of any single novel is NOT reasonable. Printed versions of any webnovel offered would cost at most $25, but to read it through WebNovel, the cost is 3-5 times more!!! Absolute Rip-Off!!

Was enjoying the book, but they want more money every few chapters. I dont mind a monthly subscription or paying per book. However, not allowing customers to finish a book before charging more is just ridiculous. I paid the membership fee plus an extra 4.99 to keep reading. I got through 3 or 4 more chapters before they wanted to charge more to continue. Thanks, but no thanks. I'm not spending a ridiculous amount of money to finish one book.

The reading experience is good, but stories have started requiring fast passes sooner and sooner over the years. Most stories require them, but Webnovel has continuously made it harder to get them. You only get three free passes a day, but two of them force you to read specific stories for 10-15 minutes to earn them, preventing you from reading what you want. Overall, a pay-to-read app that doesn't care about free users.

Things are not explained well when you purchase stuff. To unlock all the chapters, you will end up spending more than the price for an actual book. They refuse to refund you when you pay for the wrong thing, even though it was their poor wording on the app that made you misunderstand what you were buying. They are not even properly edited and end up reading more like fanfiction than original stories in many cases. Don't waste your time or money, unless you can afford $21+ to unlock one story.

it's ok. I paid for a membership and can't even read books without spending even more money and there is no option to just pay for the book outright instead all you get is 10 coins a day when quite literally every chapter of every book is 30+ coins. You can watch a bunch of ads if you feel like wasting your time, but honestly if I pay for a membership I shouldn't have to watch more ads to be allowed to use the app as intended.

It's honestly great, there's only 2 things I'd want to complain about. Unfortunately, those things are central to how I use the app. 1.) The auto reader sometimes skips paragraphs randomly. 2.) The auto reader sometimes uses French pronunciation of English words and names. Edit: I'm lowering my review to 2 stars because the auto-reader causes my phone to heat up dangerously. This is a long-standing issue that they just refuse to do anything about, I guess since it's been a problem for a while.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, I'm sorry for the bug. May I ask which mode you were using? We suggest trying the online mode, as it tends to be more stable. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: it is good for aspiring authors to get their foot in the door, but the interface isn't designed for authors in mind for dark mode. the dark mode extension works great for readers though. also the author editing mode doesn't register 'enters' or 'tabs' so to get any kind of separation for the viewers, authors have to put a singular space in the gap between text. if you are an author and don't want to bother with those issues, I recommend scribble hub. the community is great there

Its alright but I'd prefer not to use it. I only use it to read fanfics since I just flat out cant afford to read anything else and remembering to use the free passes everyday is hard to do. Despite that, I'd honestly give it 5 stars if it wasn't for the fact that I'm not convinced the app isn't a virus. An app where I read novels shouldn't heat up my phone like its been in direct sunlight for 2 hours and make my battery go from 81% to 37% in only 45 minutes of reading. Its why I use the website

It's absolutely terrible. If you want to read a book that's a little long, good luck. You'll need to buy a "subscription" that can be a few different time options, but the real kicker with it is that you dont even get to read however much you want for a month. You pay for a subscription of coins! Once you run out of coins, it doesn't matter if you're paying them money, you'll just have to wait until your subscription renews. You dont pay to read books, you pay for coins to spend to read books.

I love reading stories on this app but I can't stand how they change payment models so frequently. I used to have a subscription and then they moved to having you pay for every single chapter. For about a week or two last month you could get 3 free chapters by watching ads. Now they've followed the scam game model where you can theoretically get unlimited unlocks by visiting advertiser's sites, but most are scams and you don't even get credit if you actually do it!

doesn't actually work offline, despite having an offline mode. online mode struggles with tts. the internal currency values at 2 cents per, so you can end up paying between 10 and 30 cents a chapter, which is more than the 7 or 8 cents for an actual paperback. it is also difficult to navigate unless you already know what book you want to read. daily check in messages don't show in phone pushes, while everything else does. Speed settings for offline tts does not actually increase above x1.

Honestly, I won't lie it is a pretty good reading service due to the fact that it has a multitude of options sometimes free or not. Even if it isn't free, you get to read 40 chapters first, then decide if you continue. All in all, it is easy to use, read, etc. There is a weird problem with it that I noticed, it keeps changing text size even though I haven't been changing the settings on my phone nor on the apps settings itself for reading other than that its basically just good for fanfics

So many pop ups and the app often doesn't recognize touch input so you have to spam a button or a comment several times to get it to work. Show more comments is broken and minimizes the comments after a couple seconds. If you actually pay to read anything it's wildly overpriced. For the cost of reading a single WN to completely you could buy several professionally edited books. Now the advanced search function doesn't work, not that it was ever advanced in the first place.

I read books on a large tablet (galaxy tab S8 ultra) in landscape orientation. But this app has LITERALLY NO HORIZONTAL DISPLAY SUPPORT. Even when forcing it in android settings, it only takes up the middle 1/3 of the screen. Other reading apps don't have this problem, but WebNovel does so, it is basically unusable. I would gladly pay the fairly high price, and deal with the many pop-ups, if it meant I could read on my tablet. But Im forced to find other sources if I want a usable experience.

2 stars explained.... these stories draw you in which is what you want. however jumping thru hoops to finish a book really sucks. I keep refreshing the page hoping it will magically unlock everything. people don't have money laying around to spend on every chapter. you would do better to charge a 1 time fee to unlock everything instead of chapter fees or monthly fees. I might just have to stick to my kindle books

If I could give negative stars I would. When someone offers to upgrade something you pay the new amount and it's changed over. Not here, they offer you an upgrade but then charge you for both the upgrade and original membership. They took 59.99 for the "upgraded" 6mth membership then charged me the next day for the original 4.99 membership, by the time I caught it they had taken $45 from me for the original membership. When I brought it to their attention they refused to help.

Too many full screen ads even though I'm subscribed and a paying customer. I don't want to go through 30 seconds of multiple full-screen ads for things I don't care about. Just let me go straight into where I left off. Also, stop sending me to the new novel page. Let me choose what my homepage is instead of irritating me so much.

I love the app, although there might be a bug since when I listen to text to speech option (online version) after a minute or two it would suddenly stop. i love listening to stories when I do something so it's really frustrating to go over and activate the tts option very minute it stop
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Does the TTS stop after switching to the background or the screen turns off? Let us know on which period the issue happens so we can fix it!

scraped_reviews.content: I love the stories I've read so far, only thing is it's WAAAAAY more expensive then just buying a series of books. Everything is in USD, no option to switch to CAD that I can find. I don't think I'll ever be able to finish a single novel due to the cost. Get kindle or audible instead, it's far cheaper and you can read entire books rather than just a short chapter a day. To the writers on the app, why don't you publish. It would make your work so much more accessible! Rated teen but very expensiv

I've been using Webnovel for at least 5 years, and they have consistently found ways to make it harder to read books without paying. It started with spirit stones, which one could save up to unlock chapters - when they updated the app, they started using fast passes, and all the chapters I unlocked with spirit stones closed. Then, you could log in everyday to receive at least one fast pass. With the latest update, you can only get a all-genre FP once every 3 days. I rarely use this app now.

Membership is a complete waste of money. Read the fine print. Even if you purchase the membership, you still need to buy coins to continue reading. A lot of other apps with give you unlimited reading with a membership. What's the point of buying a membership if you still need to purchase coins. I am all for supporting writers but I'm not spending over $100 to read one book.

A few years ago, I was able to collect a ton of passes and read around 20 chapters every week. These days, I‚Äôm stuck spending at least 30 minutes daily on tasks just to snag a few rewards, and I‚Äôm lucky if I get 1 or 2 passes for the book I‚Äôm into everday. It‚Äôs really not great for free users anymore, so if you‚Äôre not looking to spend money on this app, you might want to look for alternatives because this one just isn‚Äôt cutting it.

It turned out to be a bad experience. As a writer with little time, and money. I turn to using AI to grammer correct and word writing better. The novel I have worked on and was proud of as well as getting power stones, collections was PERMANENTLY rejected because of automatic flagging. I was told my only option was to just redo it all and not have ai correct my grammer. Not to mention the cold opinion of my novel with no support, or option to make it better. 3 chances for a contact was not given

title: Health Connect
description: Health Connect by Android gives you a simple way to share data between your health, fitness, and wellbeing apps without compromising on privacy. Once you've downloaded Health Connect, you can access it through your settings by going to Settings > Apps > Health Connect, or from your Quick Settings menu. Get more from your favorite apps. Whether you're focused on activity or sleep, nutrition or vitals, sharing data between your apps can help you better understand your health. Health Connect gives you simple controls, so you only share the data you want to. Keep your health and fitness data in one place. Health Connect stores the health and fitness data from your apps in one place, offline and on your device, so you can easily manage the data from your different apps. Update privacy settings in a few taps. Before a new app can access your data, you can review and choose what you want to share. If you change your mind, or want to see which apps recently accessed your data, find it all in Health Connect.
descriptionHTML:
Health Connect by Android gives you a simple way to share data between your health, fitness, and wellbeing apps without compromising on privacy.

Once you've downloaded Health Connect, you can access it through your settings by going to Settings > Apps > Health Connect, or from your Quick Settings menu.

Get more from your favorite apps. Whether you're focused on activity or sleep, nutrition or vitals, sharing data between your apps can help you better understand your health. Health Connect gives you simple controls, so you only share the data you want to.

Keep your health and fitness data in one place. Health Connect stores the health and fitness data from your apps in one place, offline and on your device, so you can easily manage the data from your different apps.

Update privacy settings in a few taps. Before a new app can access your data, you can review and choose what you want to share. If you change your mind, or want to see which apps recently accessed your data, find it all in Health Connect.
summary: A simple way to share data between health, fitness, and wellbeing apps

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't work. Doesn't sync correctly between apps that should work with it. No user interface at all on my new Pixel 9A. Says you're supposed to be able to access it in Settings but it's not there. I have to access it through the swipe down at the top of my phone, but like I said, no interface at all. Just a section where you give your apps permissions, but still nothing works. All I'm trying to sync is Google Fit and My Air apps.

The app refuses to sync sleep data after daylight savings or time zones. There is no ability to troubleshoot in this app, or request assistance and the help pages consist of basic common sense troubleshooting, then tells you to talk to whatever app you are trying to sync with (but they'll just say they can't help because it's a third party app, even if they're both made by Google). For an app whose entire function is to sync with other apps, you'd think it would be able to do that one thing

Impossible to use; I couldn't find it on my phone and had to open the play store and go to this page to open it. There's no icon in my app drawer and it doesn't show up in search results on my phone. Apparently you can only find it in Settings>Apps>See all apps. It doesn't seem like it's meant for the user. What's even the point of it? Truly baffling and frustrating. I can't in good conscience recommend an app that's supposed to let you control your data but is hidden on your phone.

Beside what everyone is saying "complications with accessibility to the app" it does not sync data very well at all. Tried with two different brands of smart rings & two different brands of fitness tracking watches. You would think at least one would work properly but none synced correctly if at all, some days won't even sync at all. Not sure what devices were used in their testing phase but it certainly was not the 3 widely used brands.

This app is TERRIBLE. I am being forced to use it to connect to MyUHC app, but it won't sync. I have tried and tried, all permissions are open, everything -- still won't sync. Why did you stop letting Google Fit track data? That is a fantastic app that works well, and I loved it. I can't even FIND Health Connect on my phone. Absolute garbage.

Extremely problematic app. First, there is no way to create an icon or button to access the app - you either have to search for the app on the Play store/Google Search, and then click install (despite it already being installed) or access it...or oddly u can access it via Setting on Android phones, both of which are just ridiculous means of having to access it. Today, I uninstalled Health Connect. Much cleaner - now, some apps get data from my Garmin app, others via Google Fit.

Health Connect doesn't pass on Sleep data as a full block of "awake", "light", "deep" and "REM" sleep from RingConn Gen2 ring, rather it comes across as short blocks as measured through the night, so collating accurate sleep data in one app (MyAir) doesn't function as expected, only shows the first block of each stage type. Other data seems to pass through OK.

The use model of this app is very confusing. When you see that an app syncs health data from many devices together you'd think they have a nice interface that presents this data. No. All it is is a settings page showing who is using the data. Even with that minimal use, the settings doesn't show up in search and the documentation points to a setting menu that doesn't have this. One has to find this app in play store, realize it's been installed and press open button.

App is hard to access as it does not have an app icon and is only accessible via settings menus. All I wanted was to import data from Cronometer to and from Samsung Health. Health Connect constantly doubles entries and puts things in the wrong catagories. When I fix them it re-writes them again. It's extremely frustrating. Im just going back to manually entering data again. 0/10 Stars, don't use.
