I realize this is a backend app for data syncing, but it really should be integrated with Fit rather than a separate app (which is really just a setting, not a real app). I'm getting double counted on steps and activity because Fit, Zepp (my fitness watch app), and Fitbit are all reporting the same activity. Health Connect should recognize the activity that occurs over the same time period as one thing.

I agree with other reviewers. It's hard to use an app that you can only find in the Play Store (or through a deep dive through Settings). I think I'm correctly understanding that it is supposed to be the "middle man" between different health-related apps, however the apps aren't getting their data points into Health Connect without lots of clicks and finagling. For several days, I tried several random things before getting lucky, and then updates happened. Then, I saw double data. Uninstalling!

This app doesn't accurately track data. It's saying I had 4 hours, plus 2 hours, plus 30 minutes of strength training today. I had 2 hours strength and 30 of walking. It's saying I burned massive amounts of calories and is making it impossible to accurately track my macros. There is no where to go to try to correct it since there isn't an actual app. It's extremely frustrating!

couldn't find it on my phone, it didn't actually sync with my fitness tracker, had to come to this page to open it. it Pulls all of your data and doesn't let you delete it. I've tried everything to delete it but it quite literally will not let you delete anything. The app doesn't actually do ANYTHING. Do not download, im pretty sure they're just taking data.

Until recently, Google Fit would not let me sync my Fitbit data natively. I'm thrilled that syncing works now. As the app remains in beta, there are still some odd quirks, and integrations leave much to be desired. For example, there's no app icon in the drawer, so I have to search for it in the Play store, and the Meta Move app doesn't seem to be updated to work with the Health Connect Beta. Looking forward to seeing how the app evolves.

It only pulls a small portion of my fitbit data. I have years of data, and it only pulls the last couple weeks. I have been using the same fitbit account since the beginning of time, and I have not switched anything. I can still see all my previous fitbit data on the fitbit app, but for some reason, it doesn't pull any of it into Google fit. I tried clearing cache and reinstalling. Oof.

Could be better...doesn't seem to accurately sync from my fitbit to my WW app, (and vice versa). In theory it would be great to be able to sync everything from my fitness tracker to my other health manager apps, but if the data isn't accurately syncing, then what's the point?? Also, I can seem to access the app itself to control what access I am giving each app once I initially set it up, so again, not sure how helpful it really is. But since it's still in BETA, I will wait and see...

In theory, this would be a good app, but I've enabled permissions for both Google Fit and Samsung Health, and it doesn't appear to be syncing. I had high hopes it would since I use both apps in conjunction with my Samsung watch. The biggest issue with this app is that once it's installed, it doesn't appear in your apps section as an icon for easy access. You have to go to Settings-Apps and then scroll down to the app. Bad implementation.!!!

This app has been the worst experience. All I want to do is connect my Fitbit to My Fitness Pal. It worked for a few days, and I've spent every evening for the past 5 days trying to get it back. Connect this, disconnect that, and uninstall the other thing. OMG, this is so FRUSTRATING! Just connect 2 freaking apps! We can send people into space, but we can't complete what should be a simple connection. If I could give negative stars, I would. DO NOT RECOMMEND!

Like some of the other Reviewers, I have both a Fitbit and a Samsung Galaxy watch. I use the Fitbit for exercise and sleep tracking and the Galaxy watch has more features that I use for entertainment. I absolutely love the idea of having an app that can combine all of fitness and nutritional information from both. However, the app definitely still needs some work. The data doesn't sync properly so I have to constantly check the main app for the most up to date information. I know it's in beta

It doesn't work well with crossing fitbit to Samsung Health. Some things won't write over, while others double up. Im still constantly needing to open each app. I also use fitindex scale, and none of the apps connect to that. Other than that, health connect is difficult to find. At first it showed up in the search bar, but never as a widget or icon. However, now I have to go to the play store to open it. I love the idea, but it needs a lot of work.

It's gotten worse since my last update. I have given up health connect and now back to connecting Fitbit directly to MFP. Very unreliable. I seem to have to keep reseting the connections to get it to sync. My data is very inconsistent. It never synces properly. Sometimes it sync my exercise to myfitness pal, then remove it an hour later. All around horrible experience. Very limited information online on how to use it and there see to be no support. I had high hopes. It just seems unusable.

Zero stars if I could. I got this to try to link fitbit with some other apps, but instead it automatically denied permission to fitbit, then created a loop where trying to change the permissions sends you to fitbit, which then sends you to health connect, and back and forth indefinitely. Horrible. There's not even an icon to open the app! Every time I need to open it I have to search it on the play store!

This is easily the single worst mobile app I have ever used. You have to go through either the app store or your phone settings to open it, it doesn't sync with any app it claims to be able to connect to, and any information you might actually want to see is hidden behind layers and layers of utterly worthless menus. I would give this 0 stars if it were an option. One star is one too many.

It's used to sync and keep all the apps that it works with up to date with each other but it doesn't do that any more. Some days it takes hours to sync, some days it just straight up never does. For example, my watches app shows I did so many steps. A calorie and food management app that also factors in exercise shows steps but gets that information by syncing from health connect. Some days it just stays at 99 steps and never changes. Rarely is syncing working.

Apeish app more akin to malware than an actual Google LLC product. Forces a lockscreen on your phone that overrides whatever settings you had before, or else you can't use it. When you search for it on your phone, it appears nowhere- you can only access it through the app store. Which even there, I never figured out how to toggle the ridiculous lockscreen requirement. Never actually synced my fitness apps: the only reason I downloaded it. Nightmarish that Fit & Samsung Health can't just sync.

Doesn't get any readings or transmit to resmed app. At all. Not an app since there's no UI that I can find. Who knows what it's really transmitting and to whom, because it's not doing what it's supposed to do. Wifi and Bluetooth running but NOTHING to sync directly in the app. Picks up no signals. So no cpap data. Complained to CPAP company because why do they need 3rd party for data especially if the 3rd party app doesn't sync, so it doesn't even work? Just takes up space.

Don't waste your time installing. When I open the app, it just opens the permissions screen. Does not upload data from either fitbit nor withings despite having full permissions on both and several attempts to set up and sync from all 3 apps (including Health Connect, if you can really call the permissions screen an 'app'). Tried giving it a couple days in case it had a timer to sync, but no improvement.

Disappointed. I was trying to use this to sync data to a sleeping app on a Samsung after that app specifically stated to do so. Not only was I unable to sync my sleep data with the app, I couldn't even find the app under its permissions. I have tried everything I could to resolve the issue prior to writing this, but absolutely nothing worked. Honestly don't know why I even tried.

Most importantly, Doesn't work with LoseIt, so it's automatically a 0/5 there. But also it's...literally not an app? Doesn't appear on my home screen or even when I search my phone for "Health Connect". It's more like this just adds a settings page to your phone to, in theory, manage connections between your health apps. In practice it just doesn't work very well. Would rather type things into multiple apps manually than use this.

I know this is in beta right now so maybe it's not for me. But I have a pixel 7 pro and Fitbit charge 5, and the health connect program doesn't work at all. When I pull up the app, there is no information in it, or does it appear to even connect to anything. Yes, I updated the charge 5 firmware, and have the Fitbit app on the phone which works fine. I've tried for 2 hours to get anything to work but no luck. I can't seem to find any documentation on this whatsoever. So far for me, a total fail.

I used Google Fit to primarily track my steps and had ease of convenience when linking it to one of my calorie counter/fitness apps. Now I have to use this garbage app which apparently is an app that automatically downloaded into the phone's system instead of it being a stand alone app. To access it, you have to go to the system settings or open it via the Play store. Get rid of this and let me connect directly with Google Fit again. I also just tried to uninstall but cannot (still in system).

Doesn't ever work. Tried connecting and reconnecting. Uninstalling and reinstalling. It says it's pulling info from apps but it never appears in any of the connected apps. Permissions are set correctly and I've tried turning them off and back on. This is a horrible app and why is there no UI? The settings page is useless. Avoid Google products in general at this point

Does not work for me. Most apps that were able to share data with Google Fit before stopped working and don't even show up. Other apps that show up and say they are sharing data don't share anything even though all permissions are granted. That's really unfortunate, as it completely breaks my fitness routines and tracking of progress. Please Fix!

Love the idea to connect all this fitness data, but it does not work right. Steps in particular are way off. It notifies me of hitting my 10,000 goal while my Galaxy watch has only counted half that. And when I look at the step sources, they only show two sources that add up to just bately above what the Galaxy watch says. And then the number from Samsung health also doesn't match what the Samsung app/watch says, not even close. If these sync issues were fixed then it could be a powerful tool.

First of all, I don't like that every time I want to access the app I have to search for it on the search bar to open it cause it has no homescreen icon. Secondly, It seems redundant. The only reason I have it is because it is the only way to connect with my Samsung health, which keeps better track of steps than Google fit. This makes me sad cause, other than the inaccurate step count, Google fit has a better system for adding information manually.

It probably works fine for very specific apps, but the fact that this is meant to replace Google Fit entirely is worrying. I can't even access the app to change settings without using the Play store, and it does not sync any activity or BMR into my preferred calorie tracking app. The calorie tracking app developers of course blame Google for making it too difficult to keep up with the API, so here we are, stuck with broken data pipes.

All of a sudden my app steps were calculating incorrectly from my Samsung watch to Google Fit (off by 6k steps!) Apparently Google Fit was not getting data from the health connect app. I trying reconnecting the permissions and now it will not reconnect. Always said "Something Went Wrong; Try again Later". I've now tried for 4 days straight with no change. Uninstalled and reinstalled. Still nothing. Now I can't use my watch for my games (Pikmin Bloom, Pokemon Sleep). Extremely temperamental.

It's meh... It certainly does not do a good job of reading from other apps (Google Fit or Fitbit) and sending to other apps (Wellatory) which is an app that uses this one to get my steps and workouts from. And the fact that you can't see where steps or workouts are missing from makes it very....non trustworthy.

This is supposed to be the bridge between my Fitbit app and my Personify app. My Fitbit app updates frequently but this app takes more than a day to sync to the Fitbit app. It is currently 2pm and this app last synced my data at 12:27am! Therefore, my Personify app shows no data for today. Things worked better when I could sync directly to Personify. With an average rating of 2.2 this app should be shut down. I have never seen an app rated this low. But I have no choice.

App has suddenly stopped syncing properly with fitbit. It will only sync part of the data and sleep is not one of them so it is now useless for linking data with Pokemon Sleep. It's a shame as this worked for a few months now all of a sudden has stopped. I have tried removing/ revoking permissions and giving them again, uninstalling and reinstalling. Manual sync and import/ export as well as troubleshooting with Fitbit for 2 hours and they have said it is an issue with health connect.

As mentioned by others, for an app that helps connect and control your health data this app is impossible to find or work with. There is no understanding on the sync timing. The lack of useful UI prevents the understanding of all the connections. It doesn't always work as expected either.

Horrible at tracking steps. For example, I'll be at 10,000 & it will "think" I'm at around 3,700. How it's THAT off when it uses the same features as every other step tracking app & they're accurate, is beyond me.üôÑü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è It's causing me to lose numerous points in one of my apps.

This app does what it's supposed to do very well. Users don't seem to understand what this app is for - it is simply a bridge to allow various fitness apps to share data between them. This app's not supposed to show your data or track anything. You only use it to add new apps and capabilities to your fitness tracking, such as using Google Fit as your central data hub and display. If you do not need to share data between apps, then don't install this app.

Does not work. I carefully followed the instructions to get it connected (Google Fit, Map my Fitness, and Sydney Health). It pops up notification that it's syncing, but the destination app is never updated. I installed it weeks ago, checked various settings on multiple days but it hasn't worked once.

There's no actual app interface on my phone. It just goes to app permissions, but then doesn't actually connect to the apps I have selected. Even if I come back to the store and try to open from here, it goes to the permissions settings with nothing that looks like the screenshots on the play page.

Does not work. I tried to install it on my Samsung. it installed instead on an old Google Pixel phone. I uninstalled and tried again. Same results. Can't find it in the app list for either phone, and the suggested fix for that didn't work either. This is too bad because the Simple app requires it.

Doesn't actually do anything. Even Gemini is saying it doesn't actually work with Garmin Connect even though it's technically sunced. Permissions are given, sync stamps are shown within the app, but it doesn't actually show data in Google fit. just use Health Sync, it actually works for data from different devices.

This app isn't syncing with my other apps like it's supposed to. What's the point od it if it won't sync on a regular basis and I have ro manually input data into my health tracking apps. plus, what is the deal with it not syncing steps unless it's opened. completely rubbish and I wish I could just remove it.

I have no need for this app and I may have had it installed before but not currently. Oddly, I received an audible notification from package="com.google.android.healthconnect.controller" It seems this is a helper app for Health Connect, Pre-installed, trying to be helpful. I hate that Android apps default to ring or vibrate and cannot be set to silent until after they have needlessly interrupted me. It is especially annoying from an app I don't even have!

I wish I could give this zero stars, it deserves none. Apparently I now have to use this terrible app to sync my Eufy scale to the Fitbit app, which I didn't have to when I purchased the scale. Except that the app refuses to connect to Fitbit. My weigh ins stopped syncing without any warning. Given that the scale was marketed as being sycable with Fitbit I think the ACCC would have something to say about this.

title: Weather & Radar - Storm radar
description: Get everything you need to stay weather-ready with your free Weather & Radar app: ‚Ä¢ Accurate hourly and daily weather forecast ‚Ä¢ Innovative all-in-one weather maps ‚Ä¢ Rain radar, snow radar, wind radar, lightning radar ‚Ä¢ Android Auto compatible ‚Ä¢ Weather alerts, rain and thunderstorm tracker ‚Ä¢ Local air quality forecasts (AQI) ‚Ä¢ Detailed ski reports ‚Ä¢ Personalized notifications for your area ‚Ä¢ Weather widget üåû Weather App Be ready for everything with Weather & Radar‚Äôs app, with accurate current conditions, forecasts and storm alerts at your exact location in the US and around the world. üå¶ Weather Forecast Local, national and global rain, snow, temperature and wind maps. Get free, detailed hourly and daily forecasts, including for feels-like temperature, UV index and rain amounts. Plan ahead with the 14-day forecast trend. üöó Android Auto Compatible Know what to expect on the road by checking the WeatherRadar and RainfallRadar as you travel using Weather & Radar on Android Auto. See rain, snow, and thunderstorms in the immediate area and drive safe. ‚òî Weather Map Discover our industry-leading all-in-one weather radar, helping you to track rain, snow and storms coming your way. The enhanced weather maps allow you to view real-time and future weather conditions down to city and county level. Track lightning strikes in real-time when thunderstorms approach your location. üå© Weather Alerts Using the latest weather modelling and storm tracking technology, our weather alert service will always keep you updated about dangerous severe weather, snow, ice and hurricane threats in or close to your area. üì∞ Personalized notifications Stay ahead of the weather with personalized, local notifications. Get timely updates tailored to your exact location, helping you plan your day with confidence. From sudden downpours to sunny breaks, we keep you prepared‚Äîwherever you are! üåä Coastal Conditions You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to get the latest lake and ocean temperatures as well as frequently updated beach and nearshore weather, wind, wave and tide conditions. ‚õàÔ∏è 90-Minute Trend Our 90-minute nowcast gives you all the time-critical data you need, using a blend of local observations and high-resolution forecast models to pinpoint the movement and timing of rain or storms around your location. üåû Weather Widget The weather widget displays the weather forecast for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device. Choose from 4 different widget formats and scale it according to your preference. üåé World Weather Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations in our weather app. Global weather and radar at your fingertips! Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and personalize your main page! Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.com
descriptionHTML:
Get everything you need to stay weather-ready with your free Weather & Radar app:

‚Ä¢ Accurate hourly and daily weather forecast
‚Ä¢ Innovative all-in-one weather maps
‚Ä¢ Rain radar, snow radar, wind radar, lightning radar
‚Ä¢ Android Auto compatible
‚Ä¢ Weather alerts, rain and thunderstorm tracker
‚Ä¢ Local air quality forecasts (AQI)
‚Ä¢ Detailed ski reports
‚Ä¢ Personalized notifications for your area
‚Ä¢ Weather widget

üåû Weather App
Be ready for everything with Weather & Radar‚Äôs app, with accurate current conditions, forecasts and storm alerts at your exact location in the US and around the world.

üå¶ Weather Forecast
Local, national and global rain, snow, temperature and wind maps. Get free, detailed hourly and daily forecasts, including for feels-like temperature, UV index and rain amounts. Plan ahead with the 14-day forecast trend.

üöó Android Auto Compatible
Know what to expect on the road by checking the WeatherRadar and RainfallRadar as you travel using Weather & Radar on Android Auto. See rain, snow, and thunderstorms in the immediate area and drive safe.

‚òî Weather Map
Discover our industry-leading all-in-one weather radar, helping you to track rain, snow and storms coming your way. The enhanced weather maps allow you to view real-time and future weather conditions down to city and county level. Track lightning strikes in real-time when thunderstorms approach your location.

üå© Weather Alerts
Using the latest weather modelling and storm tracking technology, our weather alert service will always keep you updated about dangerous severe weather, snow, ice and hurricane threats in or close to your area.

üì∞ Personalized notifications
Stay ahead of the weather with personalized, local notifications. Get timely updates tailored to your exact location, helping you plan your day with confidence. From sudden downpours to sunny breaks, we keep you prepared‚Äîwherever you are!

üåä Coastal Conditions
You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to get the latest lake and ocean temperatures as well as frequently updated beach and nearshore weather, wind, wave and tide conditions.

‚õàÔ∏è 90-Minute Trend
Our 90-minute nowcast gives you all the time-critical data you need, using a blend of local observations and high-resolution forecast models to pinpoint the movement and timing of rain or storms around your location.

üåû Weather Widget
The weather widget displays the weather forecast for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device. Choose from 4 different widget formats and scale it according to your preference.

üåé World Weather
Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations in our weather app. Global weather and radar at your fingertips!

Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and personalize your main page!

Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.com
summary: Local forecast, alerts, rain, snow and wind radar, air quality & weather widget

scraped_reviews.content: Decent. Ads not too bad. Widgets are few and not very good. Since it is subscription based it is very expensive. If it had a lifetime purchase option I would buy it. Also, the same info is on their website (without ads) so why should I pay for the app? I just spent $25 lifetime for a different weather. I would rather have bought this one....

I've had this app for years. I love the widget. I can see the radar without having to open anything. The radar is usually the only thing I want to see and I check it often. I don't know any other weather app that makes it this easy to check the radar. The layer that allows you to see lightening strikes is fun and helps with safety. Wish there were no ads though. I think there were no ads a while ago. I'd pay a couple bucks to go ad free.

This app is OK from what I can tell, while navigating to see what kind of features, 2 min in was blocked with ads, can't even set it up all the way before the pushy adds, second it don't even have a real storm tracker with details, 3 apps I have already track hurricanes, flooding, tornados, etc with full details, not just some tiny colored dots. How bout a forecast, that's what I was looking for to compare with my other apps.

I used the app with Android Auto and it's off to a good start! I was pretty much able to follow the sky conditions and the map provided was OK to drive and follow with route numbers and state lines. I couldn't use split screen...that would be nice. Also, a compass would be nice. Good start! I didn't test it fully, but look forward to finding more features.

Full screen ads are a bit much as there's already a quarter page ad plus a banner at the bottom. The subscription pricing is way too high to consider getting the paid version. EDIT: there are now even more ads on the main screen in addition to full page ads and the bottom banner. I get it, it's a free app & you have to generate revenue with ads, but 8‚Ç¨ for the no-ad "pro" version is just too high. Comes off as greedy, esp when considering the v. aggressive anti ad-blocker strategy on the website
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Andres, you do not need to get a subscription to get rid of ads. You can also get "Weather & Radar Pro", which removes ads permanently and involves a once-off purchase only. Perhaps this is an option for you? Any questions, please let us know!

scraped_reviews.content: Seems like a decent weather app, and the fact that it works with Android Auto is a major plus. The one issue that I have with it is the use of nonstandard colors on the radar map. They make things very confusing, especially in the spring and fall, when the possibility of snow/sleet is there. There is overlap in the colors for heavy rain and snow. Which one is it today, a severe rain storm or a severe snow storm? Can't tell because the colors are the same! PLEASE, use standard radar colors!!

Ok, it works with android auto, but it's very limited. Also, in my particular vehicle, it won't split screen. The color scheme is terrible. Blue is for snow...not rain. If they want to be different, at least give the option to have different color schemes. I've noticed the current day's weather is off. It's almost as if it is looking at the previous day. As for future forecasts, their guesses are about on par with other apps, but sometimes they also show up a day off.

Bought the "pro lifetime ad-free" offer back before this app started charging a yearly fee (or had ads at all)... But then... They switched to an intrusive ad platform, requiring a yearly fee to get rid of them. Anybody who bought the "ad free license" (like myself) years ago apparently weren't good enough supporters, as it did not carry over to the new platform. Yes... This would have remained one of the best apps if the platform didn't change and they didn't screw the early supporters.

Easy to use, love the features My only complaint is the color on the radar, as it can get confusing. The color blue is used for rain when all other maps use green. Blue is typically used for snow. Can get confusing living in the north at quick glance thinking it's snowing when it raining. Maybe change the color to match every other weather radar around. Otherwise great app and easy to follow. Love the time is connected to my alarms and makes it easy to use without having another icon.

Works with Android Auto. Would be five stars if I could change the color of the selector on the screen in the car to make it easier to see. Right now you can hardly see which selection (layers, settings, zoom in/out, etc.) you're making because the ring around the outside of the button almost perfect matches the background. Other than that this app is perfect on Android Auto. Great information, accurate, easy to understand, perfect for seeing what you're driving into or through.

I had given 5 stars, now down to 2. This used to be a great tool for radar forecasts, more reliable than a regular weather forecast, and it used to be pretty accurate. Now i find the current radar to be completely wrong. It is off by at least 2 to 3 hours for NYC, showing the rain ans.snow we are.expecting in about 3 hours as current condition. This is not the first time that I noticed this lately. The current weather maps are simply wrong, it shows maps from a few hours in the future as curren

no barometric pressure chart!??! That's the one thing that I REALLY want to see. As a former Navigation Officer I like to be able to see what's actually happening. I joke that a BP chart and my arthritis is all I need to forecast the weather. and with them I can usually outdo most forecast models. (macro climate here is very singular and well known to me, but without the relevant information I can't do it. Looking to replace this asap.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Nicolas, thank you for your feedback. We do show barometric pressure in our app. If you need assistance to find it, please send us a message at info@weatherandradar.co.uk. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The app looked very interesting and useful but the registration process is broken. It forces you to register with a visa or MC for $0 but then it won't recognize a valid CC number. The one time I got it to recognize my card it tried to default to a premium membership which I declined which resulted in being unable to register. If this gets fixed I might try again and submit another review.

About the best and most accurate weather radar app I've come across to date for a lay user such as myself who simply wants to get an idea of what the weather is going to be doing in the next few hours. The weather radar is solid and has the least amount of false positives in terms of rain movement/mapping I've seen to date. Of course there is no such thing as the perfect weather app, and this one is no exception, but it does the job better than most everything else. Recommended.

The app and its services are quite good, with subscription the radar is a really helpful tool when planning outdoor activities. However, for several weeks now the weather news don't work on the app. It was said that they have been informed and are working on the problem, but that was a month ago now. Of course, the news can be read on the homepage, but their interrupted by Ads, which is especially annoying because I pay for the app. So, I'd give 4 or even 5 stars, but this is really annoying.

used to be a good app but now it's only full of intrusive apps, many of them full screen and you need to watch the long videos. only reason why it's still installed, it works with Android Auto. I am sure as soon as Google allows ads on that, they will use ever pixel of it. very sad....

Needs dark theme option OR follow the phone's theme. I see no settings to change or choose how I want it to look as far as the theme goes. Also, why the dark green background on the "weather radar"? It's barely even viewable on Android Auto because it makes the roads invisible but the gray background of the rain radar is fine. Also, why the blue rain (or any radar moisture) when conventionally rain radar is GREEN and blue is for SNOW. Knocked down to 2 stars because of all this nonsense.

EDIT: The news don't load on mobile! If I press on one, it doesn't display anything but a white screen. Hopefully you can fix this issue :) Most accurate radar app I could ever find (I tried 7 apps and this one is the best, trust me!). Accurate temps (in Romania, where I live), pretty good forecast and interesting news, facts about weather made for everyone. Even the site is good! Recommend!

The Weather & Radar app is super accurate and user-friendly. üå§Ô∏è It provides real-time forecasts, detailed radar maps, and alerts for rain or storms, helping you plan your day perfectly. The interface is clean, fast, and easy to navigate. Live radar tracking is especially useful during unpredictable weather. üåßÔ∏è‚õàÔ∏è Overall, it‚Äôs a reliable and smart weather companion for daily use. Highly recommended! ‚≠êüì≤
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

scraped_reviews.content: Used this app for years now, LOVE IT! Several settings to see everything you could want, not matter if it's the location you're in or a location on the other side of the world! You can find whatever you may need, anytime that you need it! Dependable!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

I really like the Weather map graphics and function icons on this app. I was considering upgrading until I saw the price; $30 for a weather app? Nope. There are cheaper apps that work as well so I'm going back to my normal weather app and will watch to see if the author ever decides to ask a more reasonable price to remove ads.

This weather app is brilliant and so accurate, it gives you all the information you need from the Forecast down to Air Quality and much much more. You can also go Ad Free for a very reasonable price for the year, which is well worth it. Highly Recommended.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Many thanks for the kind words and five stars!

scraped_reviews.content: You now have to accept the advertising tracking (even though it says you can revoke.) When you do revoke, it goes straight back to the acceptance screen which has no option to reject tracking. Am looking for a FOSS alternate. This app is history.
Using the app past few years and the radar observations are remarkably accurate in predicting the rain expected for the next 2-3 days. Especially useful in the course of farm work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know at info@weatherandradar.in!
Have a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: accurate and nicely designed but every time i use the app i then get a pop up message saying "location details cannot be found" even though i have location on and allowed location permission for the app.

Very good App. Pretty accurate, easy to use. Very handy to see if it's going to rain or whatever, and to whether you need a coat etc for next 90 mins. It has a 10 day forecast as well. Got a bit slow opening lately. The above review was written a while ago, since when climate change has become greater. All weather forecasts seem to have become less accurate. Also the adverts are more intrusive. So I will lower my rating to 3 stars
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We rely on ads for revenue for the free version, perhaps you would like to try the ad-free subscription? We are also sorry to hear that you feel the accuracy has declined. Weather will always be prone to occasional inaccuracies, but we are always working on improving our app with our talented team of Developers, Meteorologists and more. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This has rapidly become the only app I use to look at the weather. It is very accurate, which is saying something as I live in Cornwall where the things change by the hour. I love the radar option. though there is a gap of an hour between the Now and Today option that can be annoying. It has helped to schedule some building work and also trips to beaches/ outings with appropriate gear (though I always carry a raincoat, well, this is Cornwall!)

This app looks nice and is partly useful. Unfortunately, the amount of ads simply destroys the experience. I know there's a paid version, but I don't wanna pay 30‚Ç¨ for it, since that's clearly too much for such an app.
I use this app to display the rolling live radar on my tablet 24/7. The app crashes everyday and I have to manually restart it every day. Can you please fix this. I'm a paying subscriber. Thanks
Pretty accurate - so I can usually safely plan a day or two ahead. The rain overview is very useful. The ads are a nuisance though.

App was much better without all the ads. Would not mind as much if their were less ads and the ads were not inappropriate. I know it's done purposely to get you to pay for the ad free version....bummer.

when it works in android auto, it is super good and helpful. at times it just refuses to work under android auto. not sure if it's because ads want to run? when i pull over and load it on my phone it's ok.
Too many adverts have ruined this app. I like the GUI, however, ads are just taking over. The forecast at times are quite inaccurate so I don't feel it is worth paying for. Uninstalled
Reliable and easy to use weather app - that is spot-on most of the time. I have tried just about all major weather apps on Play Store, and this one is absolutely among the best!

Sorry but I'm uninstalling for reasons BLOODY ADS if you really need ads why not hide them underneath/behind, oh they're all stupid TEMU rubbish, so they ain't visible to the naked eye!! Other than them it's great. Sorry I'm going
Extremely different approach for a weather app. A lot of spaces for ads, but I can live it due to the quality arranged and displayed.
This app worked fine for a long time but now it freezes up and closes without reason. I've uninstalled and installed again but it changes nothing. Just keeps crashing.
This app barely works well with android auto. Half the time it is a blank screen and the other half works as it should.
Why Does This App Not Update ??? I Have Not Had This App Update For Over 10 Hours !!! App Does Not Update Weather Information Every Hour or So / There Should Be an Update Interval in the Settings.
I like this app as it has been very accurate anytime I needed to check what was in coming and it proved to be as predicted. When living on an Island you need to know the weather!
I have used this for sometime ,but three stars because about once a week it freezes ,and I have to delete then re install to make it work..

Hi, app is all good and useful, I thank you for that. Recently after entering app pop up comes with Agree & continue option for all advertisment and your info. Why I don't have a choice to accept only necessary, I have to accept everything? android user. Looking forward to hearing you
not the best at forecasting, it updates through the day but that's useless if you want to know at the whole days weather first thing in the morning.

After using 8 years I given the feedback of application about accuracy and prediction and wether changes all perfectly measured, little bit need to emprove on theme and presentation and option over all excellent üëå
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Sabir,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. If you have time and want to elaborate please send us your ideas at info@weatherandradar.in. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: Great weather app. Use it all the time as I'm on the road a lot. Easy to use too. Great forecast chart
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're glad to be of service! Thank you for the review.

scraped_reviews.content: Great to see when the rain will arrive. Pretty accurate. I do like being able to get detailed weather information on any location listed. Attractive and informative graphics. A pleasure to use.

It is a good app, not perfect (weather can change constantly). However the number of ads for Temu, who I don't even use, are ridiculous. Ads for underwear, (if youngster has this app def not suitable!). Also ads showing ebikes (again if youngster have the app not suitable), which should not be permitted. Can't get rid of the ads quick enough! The other less obtrusive ads I've noticed are ok just get rid of the Temu one!
it's great! everything I want is there the way I want it and I find it very user-friendly. only thing I feel is missing is a history of a few days in the map.

I find this app to frequently be inaccurate for my area... shame as I really like it. I hope that it can be improved, if it doesn't I don't think I'll continue with my upgrade to ad free. like I said really shame as I like all the info that comes with it.
accurate, nice graphics, nice extras such as pollen and ski areas, only missing smaller towns across europe.

title: Yahoo Weather
description:
The forecast is beautiful. 

Prepare for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts. Stunning Flickr photos match your location, time of day, and current conditions.

Favorite features
- Get all the details: wind, pressure, and chance of precipitation.
- See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules.
- Browse interactive maps: radar, satellite, heat, and snow.
- Track all your favorite cities and destinations!
- Accessibility: Enabled for TalkBack. Optimized for color contrast. 

Helpful tips
- Scroll down for detailed weather information.
- Tap the plus sign to add up to 20 cities.
- Swipe left-to-right to move between locations.
descriptionHTML:
The forecast is beautiful.

Prepare for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts. Stunning Flickr photos match your location, time of day, and current conditions.

Favorite features
- Get all the details: wind, pressure, and chance of precipitation.
- See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules.
- Browse interactive maps: radar, satellite, heat, and snow.
- Track all your favorite cities and destinations!
- Accessibility: Enabled for TalkBack. Optimized for color contrast.

Helpful tips
- Scroll down for detailed weather information.
- Tap the plus sign to add up to 20 cities.
- Swipe left-to-right to move between locations.
summary: Yahoo Weather - See the weather like never before.

scraped_reviews.content: shows local weather well, but if you navigate to "Weather around the world" (video clips), it's very easy to start multiple videos with persistant audio that continue even when you've moved on to the next clip. so you may have two or three or four audios playing annoyingly at the same time, meaning you'll have to go back to find and fish out the audios that never stopped, so you can listen to the audio for the video that you are actually watching.

Looks great. Unfortunately it doesn't provide remotely accurate weather data. I have no idea why, but it gives different forecasts than other apps, and they tend to be less accurate, sometimes stunningly so. It will be pouring out and the forecast says clear, and the radar data shows nothing overhead. So ultimately, it proved worthless to me.

update: Widget hasn't worked in a few months. uninstalled\reinstalled several times, does the same thing. Time to let it go. The radar map doesn't allow you to zoom in to see what's currently going on right above you. If you zoom too far in, the radar disappears. The weather is only good for the current day. If this were a Saturday you couldn't goto Monday and get detailed weather. I do however like the design and layout.

Pretty good weather app. Updates smoothly and the presentation is very pleasant. My only issue is that the text size for the temperature on the status bar is tiny on my Moto X3 Play. It's way smaller and lighter (non-bold) than other icons/text on the bar, so both looks out of place and cannot be read easily. I'd give the app 5 stars if I could read the temperature on the status bar. I came from another app that stopped updating the status bar temp, but it isn't much better if the temp is updated but unreadable. I'd also like to see the forecast discussion added.

It's an "OK" weather app, at least it's not trying to rip you off by charging for what the actual weather service gives you for free. I do wish the weather map that it has would show in what direction a weather event was moving in. Even a simple little arrow to indicate that on the map would be a huge improvement. Lastly, the main reason it only earned 3 stars - it's locked in portrait mode only, when all my devices are in landscape mode only! So that's very annoying!

Good, accurate forecasts. Ability to add multiple locations is nice. I enjoy knowing when to expect rainfall, and for how long. I also like the wind speed, sunrise and sunset information, as well as moon phases. Beautiful background photos...some of which are animated. I do wish the radar map had a "play" feature, and also wish there were detailed forecasts for multiple days, not just the current day. But, overall, I really like it! :)

As weather apps go, this one is pretty nice looking. It does have ads, but they are unobtrusive (as unobtrusive as an ad can be...). One thing that bugs the heck out of me is that the "ongoing notification" (temperature) in the status bar is so tiny that it's hard to read. I've tried several weather apps and they all have the tiniest temperature readout. Not sure why it can't be the same "font size" as the clock. That alone would make this a five star weather app.

Better than most but not as detailed as some of the other free weather apps that are available. The accuracy of forecasts is good (so far). I'm okay with some advertising and the advertising on this app isn't annoying or overwhelming yet. But. Like other free weather apps I've dloaded in the past there seems to be an increase in advertising as time goes on. Is it a ploy to get me to purchase the "ad free" app or is it just the time/season of the year where ads are used more? 85% score.

Nice look and layout. Very data hungry - consumes over 200MB of mobile data a month. Explain why App now needs "Photos / Media / Files"  permission. Still get weather alert notifications even though I have  notifications turned-off in settings. App annoyingly automatically adds a  city to my list even though I keep deleting it (I suspect this is the city  of my yahoo profile - but I still don't want it). Settings menu should  provide some description of each setting (some are not intuitive).

Not as reliable in terms of accuracy as it used to be. The local weather alerts were helpful to us, now, they appear to have gone away. As of 9/3/2022, the app no longer provides 'current location ' weather. Now it defaults to my home location, which I never set as any location. 12/17/22: Since the 9/22 review, the location feature is functioning again, however, it's not automatic anymore. I have to do a manual refresh each time I open my phone.

Pretty good overall. What I especially like about it is that it seems to be much simpler and less cluttered then most similar apps. I like the interface and that it is so easy to just swipe by and away the opening ad. About the only item of significance that I don't like is that it does not provide, at least that I can find or configure, accurate local air quality index. It seems to just relay overall country average, which is useless local needs, where we are at any moment.

Really pretty looking app, but if you ever go on vacation, it will seemingly forever give you weather notifications for the city the GPS reads. I keep getting precipitation alerts for places 3 hours away from me. First, I only drive thru the areas I get alerts for and second, I haven't been there in a month. There doesn't appear to be a way to reset the app's GPS history so that it clears previous locations and only reads the current one. I like it otherwise, but this is a huge annoyance

Nighttime temps are often wrong. Widget will not update at times. Full page ads are so annoying! They are large and disruptive, interfering with use of the app. Ads are fine, but not full-page ones! App is often buggy, like showing the wrong "current location" or not updating the widget without opening the app. Issues like this are common, & slow to be fixed. Like the information and UI.

Installed this app during severe weather, and the information it provided was about 45 minutes out of date (or maybe the radar was placed on the map incorrectly, not sure which is worse). UI is also poorly designed; you have to scroll *way* down to see the radar, it's zoomed absurdly far out by default, and it shows a geographic map instead of a street map so it's hard to tell what you're actually looking at unless you're in an area with very distinct geographical features.

This is the ONLY weather app that shows you not what the temp is, but actually how it feels. The pictures are beautiful, and the immediate details few, direct, and easy to read at a glance. No stupid graphs, charts, or cluttered window. No details too tiny for those without 20-yr old vision. Also, it is a delight to open my phone to see a lovely picture of my city at that hour--sunset picture at sunset, etc., over which is superimposed rain, sunshine... whatever the weather is. Yahoo, this app was hard to find among other weather apps--you really should show your app icon as a photo.

The app lays out everything in a very methodical pattern with just the facts and no extremely bothersome commercials or adds. I call it easy to read and easy to locate what you're looking for. Especially like the feature where you can "page over" to make comparisons of the different locations you have downloaded. The HD colors are beautiful. Easy to use and very well put together app.

There's no link for a radar map. There's a "map" link, but no it only shows a static map. Nothing in the drop down menu either. Also, I turned animations off. There's still 3 animations playing, and a totally useless autoplaying news cast from the other side of the country from me, that I can't make go away, and is using my data for absolutely no reason. Uninstalling.

It's been my mainstay weather app for a long time--gives me exactly the info I find most useful in the widget, and the precipitation alerts are nice. But in the last few months it started alerting me about all sorts of places nowhere near me. Sometimes it's a place about 20 miles away, which can be vaguely useful. Most times it's places 6,000 miles away and completely useless. Silver lining: I'm learning all sorts of new geography tidbits when I google the newest "where is that??" alert. None of my other apps indicate that my gps location is goofed, so I'm not sure what's up.

Great forecast. Use it as we travel around the country. Seems to be the most accurate. It's a good one...........it is 3 years later and app not always working right. Gives us weather from home, which is states away . Shows double temperatures for the week days and not always right. Like this app and will use it until we find one that works Hopefully the problems will be solved. Hooray, update fixed it. Keeping this app.

For about a month now the app has been reading about 7 degrees warmer than another app that I'm using for weather. so now I have to have two weather aps running. not sure if its my phone or the ap. 01-30-21 been using the yahoo weather ap for years. i like the radar option. i like that i can have several locations and can scroll through them and compare weather. i like that it lets you know what time the sun goes down.

OK here is why you only get one star - the app only works in PORTRAIT !!!! Alot of people have tablets and keep them in landscape mode all the time especially if you have an external keyboard. I have not found any other app that does not open in landscape,,, just this one !!! Once this is fixed I'll be happy to re-star my review.

Great! If it had a really smooth, hi def, customizable radar built in, it'd be the best app ever. EDIT .... I'm leaving all the stars, because the app is still great, but I have to uninstall it. Whichever service they use is terribly inaccurate, and reports the temperature way below what it really is at my location.

PROS: It does exactly what I need it to do, tell the weather and temperature. I also like the unique way they put background pictures that match the weather condition. CONS: All of a sudden, there are pop-up ads that weren't there before. I used to think it was ad free. Why wouldn't it be when Yahoo has other ways to make money. But it could be worse. CONCLUSION: This app is fine if you just want a quick look at the current weather and don't mind unnecessary ads.

In portrait mode on a Samsung Galaxy S9 Ultra, all I get is a static picture with the current temperature. There's no way to access any of the other features unless I undock and rotate my tablet to portrait mode (which I'm not doing because it's plugged in and docked like a laptop all day), or do something to split the screen so this app is taller than it is wide. Stop treating tablet users like second-class citizens.

Generally your weather forecast is pretty good. I also liked my set up with several cities that I track. But a few weeks ago that changed and I haven't been able to set it up as before. I had to delete the app and restart to get anything. It's only half as good as it was before. So only three stars. Update: Generally good forecasts and I am able to see the weather in those cities that I track.

I had a favorite weather app on my previous cell device, unfortunately not available in this phone model. finally find yahoo weather, so far so good. after few months using the app, not happy. weather (temperature) is not accurate, sometimes up to seven digits of difference. Not actualization of the location, very frustrating.

It gives you the current weather temperature, the hourly temperatures, the wind currency, it shows you the weather 27/7 and it even shows an exact description, including the hours from dusk till dawn, which I find amazing!!! It also alerts any upcocccming hurricanes, floods, etc. All of this in just a touch of an app. I love it and totally recommend it!!! Check it out!!!! Oh, and the icing on the cake is that's it's free!!!!!

The layout is good but the actual forecast isn't always accurate. Its told me it was going to be cloudy every hour all day and from 10am till sunset there wasn't a single cloud. I keep it because it's kinda a fun game comparing weather reports with my husband who has a different app. Yahoo used to be much more accurate but not so much lately.

While on vacation the weather for the current location still shows home. Location is enabled and navigation and other weather apps work. In addition some days are listed twice with different forecasts. Yahoo strikes again! Now it says that I don't have location enabled when it is. I'm done. It's gone.

I've not found anything to complain about based on my use. Temps, humidity, moon phases, hourly and 10 day views. Satellite for temps and precipitation. All while looking pretty. Great app. Keep up the great work! Edit: After being pestered about rating this app that i already had rated I'm removing a star. Also, the widget is starting to lose connection and not show anything.

It's okay, close enough to the vibe of Sony Weather app I tried to find replacement for... but ads and the main screen ruin it for me. I REALLY don't need to see blank screen/photo of a city I'm currently in, when I open the app. I want the weather and other info. So I'd like to have the option to "jump to info immediately/skip the photo screen". About the ads - I absolutely don't mind paying ONE TIME, full price, for a premium, ad free version. Would love to see that also. It'd perfect then.

I used to love Yahoo weather app. I love the beautiful photography of all the locations I use in the app. So far pretty accurate as well. Thank you! Well, since last time I rated the app it hasn't been as accurate as it has been. Hoping an update will fix this? No updates for this app? It's no longer even accurate like I said above here. Now there's no longer the animations? I'm probably going to uninstall this app cause without the animation it's not worth anything to me now.

Always reliable with their forecast. I love ‚ù§Ô∏è this app, Yahoo Weather it works for me. You should try this app out, You will love it, too. There are many weather apps to put on your cellphone, but I just LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏è this Yahoo weather app to me it is the best. It gives you no purssure, so many of these weather apps want too much unnecessary information from you, like wanting to control your phone, wanting just too much personal information, I hate that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for using our app! We appreciate you and are always working to make your experience even better. -A.I.

scraped_reviews.content: Informative, accurate, and very pleasing to the eye, options for severe weather warnings and custom backdrops/wallpapers for your location. Having tried others I always come back, tis an excellent weather app indeed and always on my home page Since my 1st review it has continued to improve and therefore is still top of my homepage üòÅ Yahoo weather is still my homepage widget üëå
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your kind words and support. It means a lot to our team. -A.I.

scraped_reviews.content: this app is rubbish. You never know what the weather is going to be as they seem to decide hour by hour. It told me that today I should expect rain between 9 and 11 am. Then at 11 an, they added an hour of rain. When midday came, they added another hour. It's like they don't commit themselves until the last minute. Anyone can do this.

Responding to developer: why would I take my time to do that? Just set up an email that works so you can communicate directly. I sent an email just to receive an email saying you don't respond to that email. Make it make sense. Just downloaded the app and it's freezing up every time I try to place a widget on my home screen. it happens every single time. Pretty basic function for a weather app and it doesn't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any inconvenience caused and we thank you for notifying us of this issue. We would like to investigate further. Please feel free to share with us more details on: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/. -BP

scraped_reviews.content: The functions make yahoo weather app the best, it's highly Recommended as the best weather app. Good job. Yahoo weather is very accurate in weather forecast great job, well do. I would now say I've seen lots of improvement put up to make your app better than other's. Well-done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled you're enjoying the app. -A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: It has accurate information about my zone. the only but I forgot Nd is that the widget doesn't refresh, so I need to open the app.
Easy to use. Global features üåê with pictures from the city/location reporting. Severe weather warnings, geographic data helpful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled you're enjoying the app. -A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: Hands down the most beautiful of weather apps. Alas ads ruin what is otherwise perfection. Can't pay to get rid which would happily do. VPN kills the ads but frustrating to have VPN active 24/7
All the different reviews have taken the words right out of my mouth. This is a great little app. I have no issues with it. It seems fairly complete the way it is. Thank you Yahoo! n
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled you're enjoying the app. -A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: Still my favorite weather app. It's usually the most accurate whenever I compare with another. This has been my "go to" for many years üëç
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad you're having a good experience! Thanks for the kind words and support. It means a lot to our team. -A.I.

scraped_reviews.content: There's a problem with widget. It doesn't load and it does, it takes eternity. Pls fix the problem. Thanks

I used to love this weather app. I love the actual pictures of the cities that I added to my weather list. I had this app for years but for the last few months for some reason the ongoing ad that is displayed is quite distasteful and is actually really quite suggestive sexually. One day there were very young girls dressed up with makeup and I won't mention the other stuff that's always being advertised. Soo very gross. So I'm deleting this yahoo weather app. yuck!!!! what a shame
I gave it to stars because it's showing an hour off of my time zone it's showing the sun has set very confusing it still has an hour to go
Unable to add my city. It only works for New York and San Francisco. App no good. Bad. Uninstalled. REJECTED!!
when you click on the Radar Map it doesn't do anything, , and so far it's not very Accurate when it comes to the weather
Whenever forecast is over 51%, there is more likely chances of rain. 51% however is like playing it safe, like 50-50% chances. I always rely on this app. It sets my day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad you're having a good experience! Thanks for the kind words and support. It means a lot to our team.-A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: Isn't updated or cared for at all, freezes. Why should the updated weather app be just for APPLE devices? Issues : Weather around the globe videos autoplaying. Flickr photos keep getting deleted. Would love to see Sunrise and Sunset times without swiping. First start, it appears to freeze when selecting locations and tapping continue. Have to tap home then go to the recent apps to actually start using the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thank you for the review! We would love to hear more details about this issue via our feedback page: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/. Give us more details about the issue so we can provide the best service possible for our members. -BP

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to get 5 & 10 day forecasts. Sunrise and sunset graphic for quick reference. Nice Flickr photo. Still working great (Android 16). Interesting to note that predictions vary between apps during periods of stormy weather.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We appreciate your feedback! -BP

title: Pinterest
description:
Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips  üë† and easy recipes üçú to DIY projects üõ†Ô∏è and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love?

It's Possible.
descriptionHTML:
Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips üë† and easy recipes üçú to DIY projects üõ†Ô∏è and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love?

It's Possible.
summary: One destination for a world of inspiration.

scraped_reviews.content: When I click on any of the boards in my profile, it opens "more ideas" instead of the board I want to see. It's really annoying to have to switch tabs over to my actual saved pins. There's already a button at the bottom of the screen to see more ideas, so when I click on one of my boards, I just wanna see the pins I've saved. I also hate the fake AI pictures but overall a useful app

I've been an avid user for over a decade. most recently, I contacted the help center to figure out why I keep being notified when all notification settings are turned off. I've had 5 back and forth emails with screenshots and customer service insists my notifications are not turned off (they are) and is not helpful at all. they keep requesting a video of my account, when screen shots show the same thing. useless and annoying.

I've been using pintrest for 10+ years, and I used to love it. It was a great way to discover new artists, and I was impressed by how good the algorithm was at finding things I'd like. However, the excess of AI art is ruining the app and making it borderline unusable. I don't want to see any AI content, but my feed remains full of it no matter how many times I click "not interested." Please do something about this.

Love(d) this app. Haven't been on in a few years, but holy cow, did it change ... What happened!? It's almost 100% ads and shop links now. Nearly unusable. I used to find some unique blogs/articles/ideas not found in most of the big search engines and was hoping it was still a good place for unique takes, but now I see it's no longer Pintrest, it's Pintrash.

I hate how a pop up shows up with options to send a picture every time I download a pin. I keep accidentally sending pins to people üòÇüòÖ other than that, way too many ads. I see more ads in my feed than regular pictures. The notification section has been broken for a long time. I'll get a notification on my phone that someone likes my comment, but it won't show up in my notifications. Nothing shows up anymore. When I get likes, when someone saves my pin, nothing.

The ads are getting worse, I love Pinterest but at this point it's getting ridiculous. I get that it's a free to use site, but every 3rd or 4th picture is an ad that doesn't even have anything to do with me. It's incredibly slow now after this recent update, I can't even open the app without it loading for an hour before I get to look around! AND NOW I HAVE TO DEAL WITH AI BEING ON EVERY SINGLE RECOMMENDATION

Way Too Many Ads now. This used to be my favorite app to scroll in the late night and early morning when I can't sleep and needed low stimulation content. There used to be great ads for cute items I was genuinely interested in that I would even purchase from now and again. Now, though, there are more nonsense ads advertising things I'd never buy, which take up 8/10 of the rectangles of content on the page. It now also stops your video or music when you open the app, which I hate so much.

The amount of ads is just too much! I can barely see pins because the ads almost outnumber them. There is at least one ad in view on the screen at all times. For every 3-4 pins, there are 2-4 ads. You don't think that's a bit excessive?! It looks like a wall of ads rather than pins. This is just ridiculous! Also, it's harder to move pins and sections around using the organize feature now. Sometimes they don't move at all, or they move too fast and instantly to the top or bottom.

They got rid of the options to write notes and the amount of ads is INSANE! Notes were super important, especially for recipes. Literally every other post is just an ad. This app is becoming unusable with the amount of obnoxious ads. Doesn't even matter if you try to hide the ad because there just will be another one right after.

Most of the time very good. Sometimes too much advertising like amazon that does not need to be out there. I also don't like the things that flash Where that are written in light gray , both of those items are very hard for people who have eye issues. like that.I can search . I really really dislike it when somebody posts a recipe without a recipe!!!! That should not be allowed. nor when you go to a site that you want to look at pop-ups galore.

Used to love, now I barely tolerate. It's littered with AI garbage and video ads. You can't focus on what you're looking at because there's always at least one playing and distracting you. It was bad enough when it was overloaded with ads in general, but now that they move I can't be on for more than a couple minutes at a time. And the recent update made it so when you go to your boards, instead of seeing your pins you get directed to look at suggested ones and it drives me absolutely insane.

I've loved the app for more than ten years, but the sheer amount of ads anymore makes it almost unusable. I definitely do not want another app where I'd have to pay to get rid of ads if thats where they are going. It's ridiculous how many there are. It's like 3 or 4 ads in a row every two real pins! I'm very disappointed. And the algorithm sucks anymore, too, showing the same thing over and over instead of variety. I also can't seem to find real nature inspo pics for my art that aren't ai.

Lost the ability to follow an image to the link. I use Pinterest for the photos, but also and primarily for the ability to gather a set of links for quick reference. I'm no longer able to click the image to open the link, and the "visit site" option has disappeared from nearly all of my pins. Pinterest got greedy and deceptive to keep people on the site, but in the process eliminated their purpose. Deleting the app.

Normally, the app works great. Fun content, big fan of the fact they let you filter out AI content as well. As of late though, the "something went wrong on our end" message has been a common occurrence and it makes the app straight up unusable. I've reset a million things trying to see if it was actually something to do with my phone, but still the error appears.

I've been using Pinterest for like a decade now and this is the worst it's ever been. Why bother with friends and followers? you'll never see their pins. the whole app is now 1 actual pin for every 5 ads (like, literally. i scroll and it's 5 ads in a row, 1 pin, then 5 more ads). and since the last update, whenever I try to save a pin to one of my boards, it errors out saying something went wrong on Pinterest's end. so i can't even really use the app now. I'm about to find an alternative app.

I don't really go out of my way to leave reviews. especially for apps but Pinterest was one of my favorite apps for a long time probably for several years and they had a couple of ads mixed in every dozen or so pins that you scroll through but I just updated this app today and now I'm seeing six ads for every dozen, ridiculous!! I'll be uninstalling. Your greed has ruined your app. Let's not pretend like you're not selling my data and what I'm pinning on to data brokers and double dipping.

I love creating mood boards on pinterest and have been doing so for years. It helps me sort my thoughts and is just very relaxing. There are some ads but overall the use is free. Just make sure to be specific enough in your search because otherwise the results might look very similar to each other (don‚Äôt search autumn outfit but something like autumn outfit trench coat warm colors). I also use it to find new recipes or poes for stretching after a long day. Great app!

**UPDATED REVIEW: I've been on Pinterest since the early days and I've gone through many changes and updates with the app. My original review was from 11/25/17 and I complained then. I've used it off and on for about a decade, and now is where we part. The excessive ads are insane. I used an ad-blocker on a desktop and about 40% of the pins were blacked out. It's not fun to use any more, especially with things that aren'teven relevant being pushed.** -The update sucks

I've been using this app since before I graduated highschool in 2007. It used to be a source of inspiration. Now it's just constant advertisements, and I mean CONSTANT advertisements. Trying to find something you're interested in, is now a part of the trick. There are more ads from"sponsors" than posts from actual human beings. I thought it was better than tiktok for that reason at least, for a while, but not any more. I'm really sad that this app has become.. well...nothing

This app has been more and more predatory for years, not to mention being buggy and inaccurate in predicting what people want to see on their page. EDIT: They fixed some major issues, still lots of minor ones, and the app is 100x more predatory than ever. I am positive at this point that it counts reports and hides as engagement, giving you more of what you DON'T want to see. And the amount of ads has massively increased, in addition to running offensive ads.

I've used pinterest for years and do love it, but the sheer number of ads you see has made using the app really unpleasant. For every 2 pins, you see three ads, both still and video. I would love to see either the ads decrease or (the more likely option in this day and age) a one-time payment ad-free version. It would make the user experience much better!!

i've had pinterest for over ten years. lately, i have never wanted a better alternative more. half of my feed is ads, the ui is horribly glitchy, and now its forcing me to verify my email BUT WON'T LET ME. i get constant pop-ups that lead to errors. i'm tired of it. also, when i click on my OWN BOARDS i do not want to see recommendations first. "make it yours" makes no sense and is just making me mad and close the app. i wish i wasn't nostalgic or i would have deleted pinterest months ago.

the whole point of pinterest is to organize pins, but with their new "more ideas" section being right in the board, it makes this way harder. It's the first thing that pops up everytime you look at your board. i want to see MY pins first, not just random ones. Also, whenever im organizing the sections my board and go back to organize a different section, it goes right back to the "more ideas" section. Really frustrating and ruins the main point of the app.

Pinterest has been a safe space for me for a long while now, one of the few apps that get me through hard times. However it's been getting more and more upsetting with the constant ad promotions and my main issue: AI content. I can't even search up Bedroom inspo or clothing without some AI image being seeped in there. Idk why Pinterest isn't more against AI pictures and Videos, but it should be much more clearly labeled (which doesn't work properly btw), or rid of it all together.

Pinterest used to be great. I've been using it since 2013. I was mad when they added ads to the feed. It's super annoying to click on a pin, only for it to open up the Amazon app because I didn't realized it was an ad, not a real pin that I can save. But what really infuriates me more is that now the app is overrun with AI content, especially the food/recipes side. I no longer feel like Pinterest is trustworthy. I mostly only still use it for the pins I have already saved from over the years.

I LOVE this app. I've been on it for years, & I always come here first when I need inspiration for anything and everything. Recently, though, every time I search for something, I'm bombarded with pins that are just Amazon links/ads. Every other pin is an ad, & I no longer enjoy using this app. When the ad links first really started showing up, they were not that abundant, so it was barely tolerable. Now it's a whole other story. They need to be cut back/out of you want to improve user experience

I love this app! It is chock-full of inspiration, fan art, wallpapers, recipes, etc. Very user friendly, and tons of content! My only critique being the algorithm is a little...aggressive. Like, I'll search one thing up one time, just out of curiosity, and it blows up my for you page üòÖ. Maybe only add stuff to the main page if its a constant search? Anyhow, good app.

I've been getting "violation" emails for about a month now on pins I've saved. whatever was changed, I don't like it. can l can't save anything or download images without talking me to a sales page. just gonna delete it now and use Google images. byeeee this app sucks right now. I haven't been able to save anything for a week.

Basically impossible to use. They made a program that automatically detects AI generated images but I can't find a way to filter them out. there is not a single instance that I want to see an AI generated image over a human-made one, whether it's art, a picture, or a map. In fact, I don't want to see them at all, but the app makes you. if you click on an image, it will tell you if it's AI, but not before you click on it. I'll come back when I can disable seeing any of that. Unusable Trash.

I don't know how much longer I can use this app. I'm incredibly disappointed. Pinterest used to be great but now it's nothing but AI trash and ads. The ads especially really bother me I'm trying to look at images and get ideas I'm not trying to shop!!!!! I used to come on here to relax but now I just get stressed out and annoyed. if it doesn't get better soon I'm going to have to uninstall it and that makes me really sad.

Great app blah blah blah. Star dock because of that damn price feature. If I wanted to look at products, I'd click products. I don't want to see white background stiff modeled products while I'm looking for cute inspo. [Edit]- Another star dock because of the new 'more ideas' feature. Adding an extra wall of interface between the end user and their product is the definition of poor design.

I've been using this app for a long time and like how simple it works to discover pins, although I'm seeing that the app is malfunctioning and when I go to my profile, I can't view my followers or following. Besides that, when I scroll down to see my boards, it randomly goes all the way to the bottom of the screen and I'm not able to see all of them. Hopefully the technical team will figure this problem out if this has either happened to other people as well because it's really exhausting.

I love this app and I have used it for more than 10 years, but the number of ads is getting to be too much. I hardly see actual posts anymore. this has been an issue for a while but I just was on the app and counted SIX ads in a row with no posts in between. :/ WTH?!?! I even changed my settings to try to reduce it but it doesn't work!!! this is getting to be too much... if it gets any worse I'm gonna have to stop using pinterest...Also, TOO MUCH AI!!!! stop it. seriously. do something about it!

I really like being able to save and organize things I want to save from the internet or my own creation. I use it for recipes, craft ideas, gift ideas, books, movies, and lots more. In the phone app, the option to save a private note is missing. Since that was something I used very frequently, I'm really frustrated that it is no longer an option. I used it most often to make recipe notes , such as how long it took in my oven, which pan size worked best, substitutions I made, etc.

I loved this app until I seen the dates of when informational pins were posted. I like to save money and I found a lot of informative pins like coupons, sales, etc. But when I tried using that info coupons always expired and sales no longer on sale for example. I looked into why and everything is so outdated, like years outdated . its been a pain trying to get up to date info that would actually b useful.

Look, it's a great app and I use it regularly, but as everyone brings up- I agree that the ads are absolutely outrageous, there are so many. I'd also like to add that this new feature that shows you "more ideas" before "all saves" when you click on one of your boards is a huge inconvenience. I'm clicking on my board to see what I saved, if I wanted to add more I'd press the more ideas button that's already at the bottom. Inconvenient and ugly.

I used to absolutely love this app. I'm an experienced home cook and I like saving certain recipes, especially Mexican and Asian foods. I don't know what happened but when I go to my boards, it's not just the recipes I saved. There are additional recipes all mixed in with mine! For example, if I wanted 10 different recipes for Chile Verde, I'd pin them. Other than that (However, I think this is a Big Thing) I would spend time searching daily. Maybe you could look into this? Thank you.

It has been and continues to be one of my most favorite apps! It has never let me down. It's ads are never intrusive nor truly interrupt my experience and I am appreciative for that. It feels more like a "made for me" app than any other. *Edit 1 year later*... I demoted from 5 stars to 3 because the ads are now ridiculous. Pretty much outnumbering the actual "pins".

I loved Pinterest. Used it for all sorts of inspiration. It's unusable anymore with the overload of ads. Most the time there are 2 different video ads playing on the screen at all times.
